loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia, está solicitando por un nuevo crédito por que necesita comprar cerdos para el destazo, ella tendrá mayor producto para ofrecer al público que es fiel a su negocio. El préstamo anterior le ayudo a vender más, sus ganancias fueron mayores y cancelo su préstamo.
No desmaya en seguir luchando para cumplir su sueño de tener su propia casa, en este momento su familia tiene una mejor alimentación y todos se encuentran saludables.
texts.en:
Lucia is asking for a new loan because she needs to buy pigs for butchering. This means she can offer more products to her customers, who are loyal to her business. Her previous loan helped her to sell more, her profits were greater, and she paid back her loan.

Lucia doesn't falter in continuing to struggle to achieve her dream of owning her own house. Her family now has better food and they are all in good health.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Asim

texts.ru: Асим молодой предприниматель в возрасте 24 лет. Он пока не женат и живет с отцом, матерью, братом, невесткой и племянниками в районе Б.Гафурова города Худжанд. Асим вот уже 5 лет как занимается продажей запасных частей машин. Он в своей торговой точке продает аккумуляторы, баллоны, бампер, клапан, шкив и т.д. Асим сейчас нуждается в кредите. Ассортимент его товара уменьшился и он хочет приобрести новый товар, чтобы увеличить продажу и расширить бизнес. Для реализации цели Асим просит кредит в размере 3000 долларов США. Асим сейчас усердно работает, чтобы в будущем иметь собственный дом и завести семью.
texts.en: Asim is a 24-year-old young entrepreneur. He is not yet married and lives with his father, mother, brother, fiancée and nephews in the B. Gafurov district in the city of Khujand. For five years now, Asim has been in the business of selling car repair parts. At his shop, he sells batteries, cylinders, bumpers, pistons, pulleys, etc. Now, Asim needs credit. His assortment of products has decreased and he wants to buy new products to increase his sales and expand his business. To fulfill this goal, Asim is requesting a loan in the amount of 3000 USD. Asim works very hard now so that in the future, he can have his own home and start a family.

loans.use: To buy a new assortment of car repair parts for the development of his business.

loans.name: Rene Arcides

texts.es:
Rene, está ampliando su negocio y ha decidido solicitar otro crédito para comprar abono, insecticidas, plaguicidas y 3 terneros para criarlos y luego venderlos, será de gran ayuda para su negocio pues tendrá buenos resultados como en el crédito anterior, ya que sus ventas aumentaron, los granos de su cosecha son de mejor calidad y cancelado sus negocios.
Sigue trabajando para que su negocio esté dando los ingresos que necesita para apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios, para él es importante que tengan educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Rene is expanding his business and has decided to ask for another loan to buy compost, insecticides, pesticides and three calves to raise and sell.  It would be a great help to his business as it would give him good results, just like the last loan did.  With his last loan his sales increased, his harvest produced better quality grains and he could pay for his business.

He continues working so he can get the income he needs to pay for his children’s studies.  It is important to him that they get a university education.

loans.use: to buy compost, insecticides, pesticides and three calves.

loans.name: Beza Group

texts.fr:
Enoch fait partie du groupe  Beza et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 48 et est marié à Victoire. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants  âgés de 5 à 15 ans. 
Il a sous sa charge un élève membre de sa famille élargie.

Il fait le commerce de savons, haricot, riz   depuis 18 ans. 

C’est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter 50kg de riz, 50kg de haricot et 4 cartons de savons  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait acheter un moulin et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Enoch is part of the Beza group, and lives in Bujumbura.  He is 48 years old and married to Victoire.  Together, they have four children, aged between 5 and 15 years old.  He is also responsible for another member of his extended family, who is studying.

Enoch has been selling soap, beans and rice for eighteen years.  This will be his first loan with the field partner, Turame.  He will use his Kiva loan to increase his business capital and buy 50kgs of rice, 50kgs of beans and 4 boxes of soap for resale.  In this way, he hopes to increase his earnings.

In the future, Enoch would like to buy a mill and see his children study.

loans.use: to buy 50kgs of rice, 50kgs of beans and 4 boxes of soap for resale.

loans.name: 30 De Mayo Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Lidia mujer de 64 años de edad, casada, con un hijo bajo su responsabilidad, su negocio es taller de costura en su domicilio, elabora ropa de cama, vestidos,faldas,shores,etc donde posteriormente los entrega por encargo en el mercado oriental, tiene de dedicarse a este actividad 38 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de materiales como compra de rollos de telas, hilos, elástico, cinta, etc. Socorro mujer de 61 años su negocio es una pulpería y Aurelia mujer de 62 años su negocio es la venta de frijoles, cereales, refrescos.
texts.en:
This is partnership is made up of three micro-entrepreneurs.  Lidia, 64, is married and has one child.  She has a sewing workshop in her house.  For the last 38 years she has been making bedclothes, dresses, skirts, shorts and things like that for sale on the Asian market.  She is asking for a loan to buy material such as rolls of cloth, thread, elastic and tape.  

Socorro, 61, has a grocery store and Aurelia, 62, sells frijoles beans, cereal and soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy material such as rolls of cloth, thread, elastic, tape, etc.

loans.name: Muqimjon

texts.ru: Мукимчон работает мастером, предоставляющим услуги по ремонту квартир. Ему 27 лет. Он женат и имеет дочь и сына, которым по 4 и 2 года. Мукимчон со своей семьей проживает в городе Худжанд. Он старательный, ответственный и добрый человек. У Мукимчона есть сестра, которая учится во втором курсе Политехнического института города Худжанд. Она учится на экономиста и хочет успешно закончив институт сделать карьеру в этом направлении. В этом году у родителей Мукимчона финансовые проблемы и они до сих пор не смогли оплатить за этот учебный год дочери. Приближаются экзамены и в связи с этим необходимо срочно осуществить оплату. Мукимчон видит трудное положение родителей и поэтому решил помочь им. Он берет кредит, чтобы оплатить за второй год обучения сестры в институте. Он на своем опыте знает как трудно найти хорошую работу не имея высшего образования и поэтому хочет чтобы его сестра успешно закончила институт.
texts.en: Muqimjon works as contractor offering apartment renovation services. He is 27 years old. He is married and has a daughter and a son, who are 4 years old and 2 years old, respectively. Muqimjon lives with his family in the city of Khujand. He is a hardworking, responsible and kind man. Muqimjon has a sister who is in her second year of study at the Polytechnical Institute of Khujand. She studies in the economics department and after graduating from the Institute, she wants to have a successful career in this field. This year, Muqimjon's parents had financial problems and up until now have been unable to pay for their daughter's tuition. Exams are coming up and in connection with this, it's necessary to make the payment now. Muqimjon has witnessed the difficult position his parents are in and has decided to help them. He is taking out a loan to pay for his sister's second year of Institute education. He knows from his own experience how hard it is to find a good job without a higher education, which is why he wants his sister to graduate from her Institute.

loans.use: to pay for his sister's second year of institute education.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
María, es una persona que sabe sacarle provecho a los créditos y en está ocasión solicita capital para comprar azúcar, carnes, golosinas y bebidas, son productos que necesita para poder atender bien a sus clientes.
María manifiesta que con el crédito anterior sus negocio atrajo a más clientes por ende sus ventas y ganancias aumentaron, las utilizo para cancelar las deudas y cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
María knows how to get the most out of her loans.  This time she is asking for a new one to buy sugar, meat, sweets and drinks; all products she needs to serve her customers.

María tells us that the last loan helped her bring in more customers and increase her sales and profits.  She used this income to pay off debts and cover her household expenses.

loans.use: to buy sugar, meat, sweets and drinks.

loans.name: Bonesha Group

texts.fr:
Emelyne  fait partie du groupe  Bonesha   et  habite à Bujumbura. Elle  a 32 ans et est mariée à Richard. Ensemble ils ont  4 enfants âgés  de  2 à  16 ans, dont 3 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de farine de manioc depuis 6 ans. 

Elle est à quatorzième   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de manioc  sacs à moudre pour obtenir de la farine  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait  acheter  une parcelle et construire sa propre maison et voir ses enfants  étudier.
texts.en:
Emelyne  is part of the Bonesha group and lives in Bujumbura.  She is 32 years old and married to Richard.  Together they have four children aged between two and sixteen years old.  Three of their children attend school.

Emelyne has been selling cassava flour for six years.  This will be her fourteenth loan with the field partner Turame.  She will use her Kiva loan to increase her business capital and buy a large quantity of sacks of cassava.  She will grind the cassava to produce flour which she will sell to increase her earnings.  

In the future, Emelyne would like to buy a plot of land and build her own house.  She would also like to see her children continue to study.

loans.use: to buy sacks of cassava to grind into flour for sale.

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr: Marie est une femme de 44 ans, célibataire et mère de quatre enfants dont l'âge vari entre 15 et 10 ans. Parmi ses enfants, trois vont encore à l'école. Elle est commerçante dans un marché de la cité capital, elle commercialise des vivres( manioc, macabo). Son activité se déroule dans de bonne conditions, mais est très souvent heurtée au problème de rupture de rupture de stock suite à la demande très élevée de sa clientèle. Pour faire face à ce problème, elle s'est tournée vers nous pour sollicité un financement. Les bénéfices qui résulteront de cette activité seront en partie réinvestis dans l'activité et le reste lui permettra de s'occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Marie is a 44 year old single woman, with four children, aged between ten and fifteen years old.  Three of her children still attend school.  

Marie is a trader at a market in the capital city.  She sells foodstuffs (cassava and macabo - a tuber similar to taro root).  Her business is successful but she often struggles with out of stock conditions due to the very high level of demand from her customers.  In order to regulate this problem, Marie has requested a loan from the field partner.  

She will use her earnings to reinvest in her business and take care of the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs (cassava and macabo) for resale.

loans.name: Jenny Elizabeth

texts.es: Jenny Elizabet Mayor de edad Acompañada con dos hijos menores de edad aun bajo su responsabilidad originaria de Chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer responsable, trabajadora y con muchos deseos de superación personal, muy querida por sus clientes ya ella es una mujer muy carismática con todos sus clientes fijos y eventuales. es propietaria y administradora una panadería y repostería, en la cual se elaboran: Pasteles para todo tipo de celebraciones, bocadillos y postres así como también vende el servicio de alquiler de sillas plásticas, maquinas chocolateras, maquinas para hacer algodón de azúcar y palomitas de maíz,ella inicia este negocio como un jovi haciendo pasteles para su familia, pero a medida que me hacia mas decide poner su negocio y fue así como ha ido creciendo y trabajando más para clientes en general, una de sus sueños es poder pintar su casa y construir un cuarto de trabajo debido a que con el que tiene es muy pequeño para que le puedan alcanzar todas sus equipos de trabajo por lo que  no cuento con la infraestructura adecuada para su negocio. el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en activo fijo compra de una batidora industrial y así realizar sus deliciosos manjares que realiza y así brindarles una mejor atención a sus clientes
texts.en:
Jenny Elizabeth is an adult with two children.  She is from Chinandega, in the west of her country.  She is responsible and hard-working and always wants to improve herself.  She is well-liked by her customers because she is very charismatic with her existing and prospective clients.  

She is the owner and the manager of a bakery where she makes many things such as cakes for celebrations, sandwiches and desserts.  She also rents out plastic chairs and machines for making chocolate, cotton candy and popcorn.  She started this business when she was young making cakes for her family.  She tells us “as I started to do more I decided to set up a business and it started to grow as I worked for more general customers”.  

One of her desires is to paint her house and build a workshop because the one she has now is very small and she does not have enough space for all the equipment that she uses.   Therefore, she does not have the necessary infrastructure for her business.  

This loan is to invest in an industrial food mixer which is a fixed asset that will enable her to make her delicious delicacies and provide a better service for her customers.

loans.use: to buy a fixed asset such as an industrial food mixer.

loans.name: Auralina Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Auralina es habitante de la comarca Madrigales Norte, junto a su compañero de vida lucha a diaria para salir adelante ella tiene como actividad comercial, elaboracion y venta de Tortillas todos los dias, ademas vende refrescos, Leche agria, Frijoles cocidos, su compañero le apoya en todo ya que trabaja en una Panaderia, su mayor sueño es mejorar sus condicones de vida, el credito lo solicia para  la compra de Maiz por quintal, Comales, una Mesa para palmear mejor. Agradece el apoyo y confianza que Kiva y Afodenic  le han brindado.
texts.en:
Auralina is from the north of Madrigales.  With her partner she works hard every day to get along in life.  Her business every day is making and selling tortillas, as well as the sale of soft drinks, buttermilk and cooked frijoles beans.  Her partner supports her by working in a baker’s.  

Her biggest dream is to improve her standard of living.  She is asking for a loan to buy corn in bulk, pans for heating tortillas and a table where she can knead better.  

She is grateful for the support that Kiva and Afodenic provide her.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Mucungwe Group

texts.fr:
Férdinand  fait partie du groupe  Mucungwe   et  habite à Bubanza. Il  a 41 ans et est marie à Suzanne. Ensemble ils ont  6 enfants âgés  de  3 à  18 ans, dont 4 étudient.

Il fait le commerce de farine de bière industrielle Primus depuis 6 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  8 caisses de bière Primus à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait  acheter  une terre pour la culture des produits vivriers  et voir ses enfants  étudier.
texts.en:
Férdinand is part of the Mucungwe group, and lives in Bubanza.  He is 41 years old, and married to Suzanne.  Together they have six children, aged between three and eighteen years old.  Four of his children attend school.

Férdinand has been selling Primus beer for six years.  This will be his first loan with the field partner Turame.  He will use his Kiva loan to increase his business capital, and buy eight cases of Primus beer to resell.  In this way, he hopes to increase his earnings.

In the coming years, Férdinand would like to buy some land to grow food produce, and see his children study.

loans.use: to buy eight cases of Primus beer for resale.

loans.name: Murwiza Group

texts.fr:
J. Luc  fait partie du groupe  Murwiza  et  habite à Bubanza. Il  a 39 ans et est marié à Olive. Ensemble ils ont  4 enfants âgés  de  1 à  12 ans, dont 3 étudient.

Il fait le commerce de manioc sec  depuis 6 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de manioc  sec (200kg)  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait  acheter  une parcelle et voir ses enfants  étudier.
texts.en:
J. Luc is part of the Murwiza group, and lives in Bubanza.  He is 39 years old and married to Olive.  Together, they have four children, aged between one and twelve years old.  Three of their children attend school.

J. Luc has been selling dried cassava for six years.  This will be his first loan with the field partner, Turame.  He will use his Kiva loan to increase his business capital, and buy a large quantity (200 kgs) of dried cassava for resale.  In this way, J. Luc hopes to increase his earnings.

In the future, J. Luc would like to buy a plot of land, and see his children study.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity (200kgs) of dried cassava, for resale.

loans.name: Renata

texts.ru:
Рената занимается быстрым питанием. В Дрогобыче она торгует курями-гриль, блинчиками, хот-догами, картошкой фри, соками, кофе, чаем и мороженым. Ее торговая точка расположена прямо в на крупном местном рынке. Место очень хорошее, многолюдное. Большинство ее покупателей – это люди, которые приезжают из близлежащих сел и Закарпатья продавать сыр, молоко, зелень, сажанцы и рассаду. Рената начала это свое дело относительно недавно – всего 1 год назад. Помещение, в котором она работает, она арендует. 
Рената планирует вложить дополнительные средства в размере 5 000 гривен в закупку продуктов питания для своего небольшого кафе. Она планирует работать и дальше, развивая свой бизнес, вкладывая в его рост и дальнейшее расширение.
texts.en: Renata is in the fast food business. In Drogobych, she sells roasted chicken, blini (thin pancakes with filling), hot dogs, french fries, juices, coffee, tea and ice cream. Her shop is located right in the middle of the largest part of the market. The location is really great and filled with people. The majority of her customers are people who come from neighboring villages and Transcarpathia to sell cheese, milk, herbs, seedlings and sprouts. Renata began her business relatively recently -  just one year ago. She rents the premises on which she works. Renata plans to use the additional funds in the amount of 5000 hryvnia to buy food products for her small café. She plans to work and then, developing her business, invest in its growth and future expansion.

loans.use: to purchase food products for her café.

loans.name: Anastasia

texts.ru:
Анастасия – из Дрогобыча. Она – вдова, у нее есть одна дочь, сын трагически погиб не так давно. Анастасия продает женское и мужское белье. Занимается такого рода торговлей уже 8 лет. Торгует на улице, в палатке, которая расположена очень выгодно.
Анастасии нужна сумма в 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить дополнительную партию женского и мужского белья. Товар этот всегда пользуется спросом, люди регулярно покупают белье.
texts.en: Anastasia is from Drogobych. She is a widow and has one daughter. Her son died tragically, not too long ago. Anastasia sells women's and men's underwear. She has been in this type of retail business for 8 years now. She sells outside under a canvas which is advantageously located. Anastasia needs 5000 hryvnia to buy an additional assortment of women's and men's underwear. This kind of product is always in demand, as people regularly buy underwear.

loans.use: to purchase an additional assortment of men's and women's underwear for retail sale.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana María es una señora viuda, con mucho empeño y esfuerzo ha logrado obtener un pequeño local en un mercado de Managua donde comercializa ropa de segunda mano para niños, jóvenes y adultos. Sus ingresos los destina para los  principales gastos básicos en su hogar y alimentación. Solicita este crédito con el fin de invertir en su negocio, adquiriendo más y mejor mercadería la cual ofrecerá a su clientela, en esta ocasión comprara cajones de paca de ropa variada, de esta manera Ana María desea garantizar las ventas y continuar ampliando su mercado, ya que es una mujer sola que lucha por salir adelante a pesar de las dificultades que ha sobrepasado en la vida.
texts.en: Ana Maria is a widow who puts forth lots of effort and has managed to set up a small stall in a Managua market.  There she sells second hand clothing for children, teens, and adults and uses her income to pay for her basic household needs and buy food.  She is asking for this loan to buy more merchandise to offer her customers, and buy boxes of packs of various types of clothing.  In this way Ana Maria can guarantee her sales and continue expanding her market share.  She lives alone and works hard to get ahead, despite the difficulties of life that she has managed to overcome.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Ruslana

texts.ru:
Руслана уже ощутила на себе позитивный эффект от использования кредита КИВА. Благодаря дополнительному пополнению ассортимента и расположению торговой точки в очень людном, проходном месте, Руслана смогла справиться с конкуренцией и удержать свой бизнес на плаву. Она старается изо всех сил, воспитывая двоих детей и помогая также маме финансово. 
В этот раз Руслана планирует использовать кредит в размере 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить носки, нижнее белье, теплые детские колготки и т.д. За счет очередного приобретения нужного ассортимента Руслана сможет увеличить выручку и получить дополнительный доход.
texts.en:
Ruslana has already felt the positive effect from using a KIVA loan first-hand. Thanks to the additional replenishment of a variety of goods and the placement of her shop in an area with a lot of traffic, Ruslana has been able to be compete with other retailers and keep her business afloat. She tries with all her strength to raise her two children and help out her mother financially. 

This time, Ruslana plans to use the 5000 hryvnia loan to buy socks, underwear, warm tights for children, etc. As a result of the upcoming purchase of the necessary assortment of goods, Ruslana will be able to increase her sales and receive additional earnings.

loans.use: to purchase socks, underwear and stockings for retail sale.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara tiene 47 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires, su población se dedica al comercio de granos, cultivos de frutales y ganadería, es una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bosques de algarrobo, a dos horas de la ciudad de Morropon, que se ubica a en la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de granos maíz, soya, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, es una mujer emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para comprar abarrotes para colocar una bodeguita y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sara is 47 years old and lives in the Buenos Aires district.  The people there raise grains, fruit, and livestock and it’s a community known for its carob forests, located two hours from the city of Morropon, in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

She sells corn and soy out of her home.  She is an enterprising woman and is asking for a loan of 1,000 Soles to buy grocery items so she can set up a small store and increase her income and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy grocery items.

loans.name: Renzo Jhoar

texts.es:
Renzo es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que trabaja como chofer de mototaxi alrededor e 10 horas ya que su única fuente de ingresos para poder solventar sus gastos.

Renzo está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo y de esta manera poder trabajar de manera más segura, y asi seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Renzo is a young man with a great desire to get ahead, so he works as a moto-taxi driver for about 10 hours a day.  This is his only source of income to pay his expenses.

Renzo is grateful to the Kiva lenders, whose help has allowed him to maintain his vehicle, feel more secure in his work, and allowed him to continue working toward making his dream become a reality, “Attending university.”

loans.use: to manitain his vehicle.

loans.name: Cecile

texts.fr: Cécile est une femme âgée de 32 ans célibataire et mère de quatre enfants dont l'âge vari entre onze et trois ans. Elle est commerçante dans un marché de la cité capitale et vent du charbon de bois. Son activité se déroule dans de bonne condition car elle arrive à faire un chiffre d'affaire de FCFA 500 000 (cinq cent mille) avec un stock de FCFA 200 000(deux cent mille). Cependant, elle fait face à un sérieux problème au niveau de la quantité de sa marchandise. Car elle n'arrive pas à satisfaire dans les délais et en quantité suffisante sa clientèle, qui ne cesse de grandir chaque jour. C'est pour faire face à ce problème qu'elle s'est tournée vers nous pour solliciter un financement. Les bénéfices qui résulteront de ce crédit seront par la suite réinvestis dans l'activité et le reste lui permettra de s'occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Cécile is a 32-year-old, single woman.  She has four children, aged between three and eleven years old.  She is a charcoal trader at a market in the capital city.

Cécile's business is very successful, she makes 500,000 francs CFA from a stock of 200,000 francs CFA.  However, she has a serious problem with the stock levels of her business.  She cannot meet the quantity or leadtime demands of her customers.  Also, the quantity of her customers increases daily.  In order to resolve this problem, Cécile has requested this loan from the field partner.

The earnings that result from this loan will be used to reinvest in her business, and take care of the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Josette Charlotte

texts.fr: Josette est une femme qui vit dans un quartier de la capitale. Mère de famille, lle tient une vente de charbon depuis 21 ans. Grace à sa témérité elle s'est faite une grande clientèle qu'elle aimerait continuer de satisfaire. Pour cela elle sollicite un crédit qui lui permettra d'augmenter son stock de charbon. Les bénéfices tirés de ce prêt lui permettront d'augmenter son capital et d'assurer la pérennité de son commerce tout en subvenant aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Josette is a woman who lives in a district of the capital city.  She is the mother of a family and has been selling charcoal for 21 years.

Thanks to her courage, she has built up a large clientele, and she would like to continue to satisfy their demands for charcoal.  To do this, she has requested a loan from the field partner, which will allow her to increase her stocks of charcoal.  

Josette will use her earnings to increase her business capital, and ensure the continuation of her business.  At the same time, she will be able to take care of the needs of her family.

loans.use: to increase her stock of charcoal.

loans.name: Ricardo Ernesto

texts.es: Ricardo de 33 años de edad habita junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 3 años, 12 años y 13 años de edad. Para él lo más importante es su querida familia, y es por eso que trabaja muy duro para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Ricardo se dedica a la agricultura principalmente a la siembra de hortalizas y frutas. Además, también hace trabajos de albañilería ya que muy joven aprendió dicho oficio el cual ahora en día le permite tener  mayores oportunidades de trabajo. Su deseo es terminar una pequeña casa que comenzó a construir hace algunos meses y que por falta de recursos económicos no logró terminar. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, arena y cemento para terminar su vivienda y mudarse lo antes posible junto con su familia.
texts.en: Ricardo is 33 years old and lives with his wife and three children, ages 3, 12, and 13.  His family is most important to him, so he works hard to bring home the bacon.  Riardo is mainly a farmer and raises vegetables and fruits.  He also works as a mason, having learned this when he was very young and now it allows him to have better work opportunities.  He wants to finish building a small house that he started a few months ago, but was not able to finish due to a lack of resources. He is asking for this loan, through FUSAI, to buy galvanized metal, lumber, sand, and cement to finish his house so he and his family can move as soon a possible.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente de 68 años de edad, es una persona que solo estudio hasta sexto grado, casada, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa, quien depende de las actividades que él realiza.

 Vicente  se dedica a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de sus padres.  Para llegar a la parcelas camina 2 Km.  y  trabaja durante la mañana, mientras a su esposa durante la mañana ordeña y se dedica a  vender la leche y luego en el transcurso de la tarde, cuida los animales en los potreros que alquila.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una vaca lechera y producir mas leche para procesarla es queso, crema y así obtener más ingresos para el sustento de su familia.

Él desea arreglar su vivienda, ya que el techo no sirve porque se filtra el agua, lo que le daña los bienes que posee.
texts.en:
Vicente is 68 years old and has a sixth grade education.  He is married and his wife is a housewife.  He and his wife rise at 4:00 am and she is dependent on him.

Vicente is a farmer, which he learned from his parents, and he walks 2 km to get to his farm plots, meanwhile his wife milks the cows and sells the milk.  Later in the afternoon she cares for the animals in the stalls they rent.

He is asking for this loan, through Fundación Campo, to buy a dairy cow to produce more milk to make cheese and cream and increase the income to support the family.

He wants to fix up his home because the roof is no good anymore and it leaks.  This damages his things.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jenny Maria

texts.es:
Jenny Maria es una joven estudiante de Derecho, ella esta solicitando un préstamo para poder pagar sus estudios, esta es su historia Mi nombre es Jenny   María, tengo 26 años de edad Vivo en la Duverge, La Vega Rep. Dom. Nací y crecí en San Francisco Pie del Santo Cerro, tengo 2 hermanos, y 2 hermanas, soy madre Soltera, tengo  un hijo de 6 años el cual es el motor  que me impulsa a seguir adelante, mi padre Falleció hace 10 años, mi madre  es una persona  enferma que necesita de nosotros  para sostenerse.
Mi necesidad de este préstamo es muy grande ya que deseo terminar mi carrera para poder llegar a ser una buena profesional,  La educación es el alma más poderosa que puedes usar para cambiar el mundo. Solo estudiando llegamos a tener un mejor futuro una mejor forma de vida, todas las cosas buenas se nos facilitan si tenemos un buen conocimiento del estudio y del saber, podemos llegar lejos. 
Actualmente estoy en el 4to año de la carrera de Derecho  en la Universidad Católica Tecnológica Del Cibao UCATECI, me motiva estudiar esta carrera porque no me gustan las injusticias que a veces se cometen con los más débiles y  más pobres de nuestra sociedad, conociendo de mis derechos como ciudadana, saber de las leyes cómo se rige nuestro país sé que puedo aportar un granito de arena a mi pueblo que tanto lo necesita.  
De no lograr este préstamo me vería muy forzada y con muchas posibilidades de abandonar la universidad.  Dentro de mis mestas está luego de terminar la universidad ser Jueza  de la Suprema Corte de Justicia de mi país.
texts.en: Jenny Maria is a young law student who asks for a loan in order to pay her university fees. She is 26 years old and lives in La Duverge, La Vega, Dominican Republic. She was born and raised in San Francisco Pie del Santo Cerro, and has 2 brothers and 2 sisters. A single mother, she has a 6-year old son who is her reason for giving her all in life. Her father died 10 years ago, and her mother is very ill and needs the family to support her. Jenny Maria has great need of this loan in order to finish university and embrace her chosen career. She believes that education is the most powerful tool people can use to change the world. It is only through education that people can aspire to a better future and a better life. Studying diligently and knowing the value of knowledge can help people go very far and achieve many positive things. Jenny is a fourth-year law student in Universidad Católica Tecnológica del Cibao (UCATECI). She says she chose to study law because she is tired of seeing the poor and the weak fall prey to injustice in her country. She wants to help her people by being aware of her rights as a citizen and knowing the laws of the country and the way it is governed. Without the loan, she would not have enough money to keep attending university. Her goal is to graduate and then become a great practicioner of law, maybe even a Supreme Court Justice one day...

loans.use: to pay for her university fees.

loans.name: Almagul

texts.ru: Алмагул 52 года, вдова, одна воспитывают 3 детей. У Алмагул - среднее образование, она домохозяйка, после потери мужа она долго не могла придти в себя, так как потеряла родного человека и кормильца семьи, благодаря своим детям она постепенно пришла в себя и первой ее задачей и проблемой было то, как прокормить детей и семью. И она решила заняться животноводством, как и все сельчане проживающие в одном селе вместе с ней. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Алмагул занялась животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Алмагул и активной помощи ее детей, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 теленка и 40 овец, а также имеет земельный надел размером 1,0 ГА, на котором выращивает фасоль и картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). Алмагул входит в группу "Зета-2", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. Алмагул  является третьим членом группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Алмагул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Алмагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку участка.
texts.en:
Almagul is 52 years old, widowed, and is raising three children by herself. Almagul has a secondary education. She is a homemaker. After the death of her husband, it took her a long time to recover, as she had lost she the person closest to her and her family's breadwinner. Thanks to her children, she gradually came round. The first of the tasks and problems she needed to figure out was how to feed her children and family. She decided to take up animal breeding, as all of her fellow villagers do.  

As the main source of income for her family, Almagul practices livestock breeding. She started this business 10 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Almagul's hard work and the active assistance from her children, she currently has 2 calves and 40 sheep on her farm, as well as a 1.0 hectare plot of land on which she grows beans and potatoes. Her monthly income is 5,000 som (KGS). Almugal entered into the farming group "Zeta-2." There are already 2 people in this group; she is the third member. 

For the purpose of further developing her business, Almagul turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy bulls to increase the size of her herd. Almagul plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy bulls.

loans.name: Akram

texts.en:
Akram is a 48-year-old married man from Tulkarm City. He is a father of five sons and four daughters. For the past ten years, Akram and his sons have been working in a small store selling paints and some construction materials. It is a good business and earns a good income.
Akram took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products, especially paints. This will help Akram to develop his store since he needs more inventory. Akram appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more products, especially paints, for his store.

loans.name: Maia

texts.en: Maia is 36 years old, married, and lives with her two school-age children in the Samtredia district. Maia is jobless at the moment and the only money source for the family are small-sized money transfers from the abroad where Maia’s husband works. She has requested a small-sized loan to start up a beauty salon, as she used to work as a hairstylist and has experience in this field. Her loan request was approved in the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisions the provision of a business start-up and re-start-up credits with reasonable conditions for the country's vulnerable poor who do not have access to credit products since they are regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of low income. Maia wants to rent a space and purchase the needed modern inventory for a hair care business. She will serve the customers as a stylist and generate daily income. According to her estimates, the business will be lucrative and the profits will be reinvested in the business. Maia will be able to increase her spending to satisfy their daily needs and improve their standard of living in the future.

loans.use: to start a beauty salon.

loans.name: Shadi

texts.en: Shadi is 33 years old and is married with four children; they attend the public primary school. They live in their own house in a rural area. For 5 years, Shadi has worked as a taxi driver using a rented car. One year ago he bought a car but was not able to pay the entire price. So he asked Ryada for this loan to complete the payments which will allow him to register the car in his name. Shadi has a lot of customers who prefer to use his taxi service since he drives attentively and very carefully. He hopes that this business will increase his income and give his children good living standards and meets their needs .

loans.use: to complete his payments on his taxi.

loans.name: Sami

texts.en:
Sami is 32 years old; he lives in Gaza with his wife and three children in the family house. He sells various kinds of foodstuffs such as cookies, candies, soft drinks, juices, macaroni, and many other items in his grocery store that is attached to his house. He opened it 5 years ago.
Sami is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a display box and shelves. This will allow him to be able to increase his stock. He is ready to work even harder, make sacrifices and push every once in a while to achieve his goal and become a successful entrepreneur.  His dream is to build a separate house for his family.
Sami is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase a display box and shelves.

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr:
C’est en1978, qu’elle a obtenu son diplôme en couture. Quatre ans plus tard, elle a commencé à pratiquer, en ouvrant un atelier avec l’appui de son époux. Après que ce dernier ai pris la retraite, ils sont rentrés au village d’origine où avait construit son mari, c’est là qu’elle a transféré son activité. Dès son arrivée, elle a fait le tour de la localité pour inspecter les lieux et avoir une idée sur le potentiel de couturiers qui s’y trouvent. Par amour du métier, elle a essayé de les regrouper et de former une association dans laquelle elle a créée un remis à niveau pour ceux qui en voulait. Vu qu’elle n’a pas eu le consentement de tout le monde, elle s’est tournée vers sa propre activité qu’il restait à faire connaitre et à s’affirmer dans le village. Elle a alors repris contact avec ses clients et grâce à cela elle a marqué le territoire.
Khady vient pour la première fois solliciter auprès de l’IMCEC un financement afin de pouvoir acheter de la garniture, des tissus pour confectionner et vendre. Elle emploie 6 personnes dans son atelier et  travaille de 9 Heures du matin à 19 Heures du soir.
 Khady a cinq enfants, elle appuie son mari qui est à la retraite dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne. Vu son cursus, elle a toujours rêvé d’ouvrir une unité de formation en coupe, confection et couture et a besoin d’un appui financier consistant.
texts.en:
In 1978, Khady obtained her sewing diploma.  Four years later, she opened her own sewing business, with the help of her husband.  After her husband retired, the couple moved back to their home village and built a house.  Khady transferred her business as well.  In the beginning, she visited the local area to see possible premises and assess the business potential of seamstress businesses located there.  

Out of love for her business field, Khady tried to create an association of seamstresses to establish good working practices.  She failed to get the approval of everyone, so she concentrated on establishing her own business in the village.  She re-established contact with her customers and succeeded in building a good reputation.

Khady has requested this first loan from the field partner, UIMCEC, in order to buy trimmings and fabric to make clothes for sale.  She employs six people in her workshop and works from 9am until 7pm.

Khady has five children and supports her retired husband with the day-to-day expenses of their family.  

In keeping with her history, she has always dreamed of opening a training school for cutting, making and designing clothes.  In order to do this, she will need consistant, financial support.

loans.use: to buy trimmings and fabric to make clothes for sale.

loans.name: Maria Secundina

texts.es: María de 47 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hija y su pequeña nieta. Se gana la vida por medio de la venta  de productos de belleza por catálogo. Todos los días recorre las principales zonas de su comunidad para ofrecer sus productos los cuales son muy demandados. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro de tal manera que le permita construir un pequeño cuarto dentro de su vivienda.
texts.en: Maria is a 47 year old single mother who lives in her own home with her daughter and her little granddaughter. She makes a living by selling beauty products from a catalogue. Every day she goes to the main areas in her community where she offers her products which are very much in demand. With the aim of improving her living conditions Maria has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing bricks, cement, sand and iron so that she can build a small room inside her house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron to build a room

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: María auxiliadora, es una humilde señora, soltera que procreo 6 hijos, tiene bajo su cargo a dos nietas, ella se dedica a su pequeña venta de pulpería, ubicada en su casa de habitación. Con este crédito que solicita desea abastecer su negocio de nuevos productos como frutas, verduras, recargas para celulares y productos que vende diariamente como granos básicos, pollo, carne entre otros. Con los ingresos María Auxiliadora desea ir mejorando su vivienda gradualmente, ya que esta al pasar de los tiempos requiere de mantenimiento.
texts.en:
María Auxiliadora is a humble woman. She is single and has six children. She takes care of two granddaughters and has a small grocery store at home.

She is requesting a loan to stock her business with new products such as fruits, vegetables, prepaid phone cards, basic grains, chicken and meat. With her income, María wishes to gradually continue improving her house, since it requires maintenance as it gets old.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, phone cards, grains, chicken, meat, etc.

loans.name: Yesenia Lissete

texts.es: Yesenia de 28 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 13 años y 1 año de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de ajos de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. Para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos se desarrollen en buenas condiciones y tengan mejores oportunidades a las que ella ha tenido. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación y conexión de la energía eléctrica y para el pago de mano obra. Espera poder tener acceso al financiamiento ya que no puede hacerlo de otra forma. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 28 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and two children aged 13 and 1. She works selling garlic on a stall in different parts of her area. The most important thing for her is that her children grow up in good conditions and that they have better opportunities that she had.

She is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the installation and connection of electricity and to pay the labor costs. She hopes to be able to access this financing since she cannot do it any other way. She has shown that she has the capacity to make the loan repayments.

loans.use: to install and connect electricity in her home.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia es una joven de 25 años de edad, agricultora, en un estado civil (unión libre) con un grado educativo primaria completo cursado gracias al apoyo financiero y moral por sus padres. Ella es madre de 2 hijos menores de edad los cuales estudian en una escuela de su comunidad. El rubro de la agricultura la siembra de hortaliza (papa) la ejerce desde hace 10 años aprendiendo dicha actividad por sus padres quienes son agricultores por tradición y hoy día lo sigue practicando con su pareja de hogar. El terreno que ella y su compañero de hogar trabaja es propio el cual está ubicado muy cerca de su casa lo que les permite como pareja estar al pendiente de sus cultivos como la limpieza, aplicación de abono, foliares, etc. insumos que ayudan al fortalecimiento, cuidado y desarrollo del producto.    
Sus metas son poder cultivar una buena cantidad de papa para poder generar una excelente ganancia sobre el producto y volver a re-invertir en el mismo pero un poco más libre de compromisos. Sus Sueños como madre es apoyar a sus hijos hasta el final cumpliendo con sus estudios, necesidades entre otras que se presenten en el camino. 
Virginia actualmente solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos como abonos, fertilizantes para poder asistir el producto de papa que ya tiene cultivado ya que gracias a este financiamiento ella podrá mejorar y estabilizar su economía esperando en sus cultivos de papa una buena producción.
texts.en:
Virginia is a young woman of 25 and a farmer. She is in a de facto relationship and has completed primary school education, thanks to the financial and moral support of her parents. Virginia is mother to two young children who are studying at a school in the community. She has worked in agriculture sowing potatoes for ten years after having learnt from her parents, both of whom carry on the family tradition of farming, and she still works on the farm together with her partner. The land that she and her partner tend to is their own and is situated very close by to their house. This allows them to work as a couple and keep an eye on their crops by clearing the land and adding fertiliser and foliar feed, both of which help to strengthen, care for and develop their crops. 

Virgina's goals are to amass a good amount of potatoes to generate excellent profits from her crops which she can then reinvest again in her crops, but this time a little freer of responsibilities. Her dreams as a mother are to support her children until they complete their studies and to meet all their needs and anything else that comes up on their life journey.

Virginia is currently seeking a loan to buy supplies such as manure and fertiliser to help her with her current potato crop. Thanks to this loan she will be able to improve and stabilise her financial situation while hoping to get a good harvest of potatoes out of her crop.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her potato crops

loans.name: Kachkymbubu

texts.ru: Качкымбубу 57 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Супруг-фермер, дети помогают по хозяйству. У Качкымбубу - средне-специальное образование, окончила училище, по специальности "Повар". Трудовую деятельность начала в школьной столовой, также в течение долгого времени проработала поваром  в общепите. На сегодняшний день работает в столовой местной средней школы, параллельно со своей семьей занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Качкымбубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 3 лошади, 2 жеребца, а также обрабатывает земельный надел размером 1,80 ГА, на котором выращивает фасоль, картофель и многолетнюю траву. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). Качкымбубу входит в группу "Диана", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. В итоге их трое. Качкымбубу является лидером группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Качкымбубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетелей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Качкымбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку земельной доли, чтобы еще больше расширить земельный надел и обрабатывать ее.
texts.en:
Kachkymbubu is 57 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Her husband is a farmer and their children help with the farm. Kachkymbubu has a secondary specialized education. She graduated from a chef training school. She started her career path in a school cafeteria and for a long time, she worked as a chef in a food court.  She currently works in a secondary school cafeteria while simultaneously practicing animal breeding and crop farming with her family. 

She started this business 20 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Kachkymbubu's hard work, she currently has 1 milk cow, 3 horses and 2 stallions on her farm, as well as a 1.80 hectare plot of land on which she grows beans, potatoes and perennial grasses. Her monthly income is 5,000 som (KGS). Kachkymbubu entered into the agricultural group "Diana." There are two other members of this group, three of them in total. Kachkymbubu is the leader of the group. 

For the purpose of further developing her business, Kachkymbubu turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy calves to increase the size of her herd. Kachkymbubu plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a plot of land in order to expand her land even further and cultivate it.

loans.use: to buy heifers.

loans.name: Ibraheem

texts.en:
Ibraheem is 20 years old and lives with his family in Gaza. His life conditions prevented him from completing his higher education so he became a fisherman. Ibraheem earns around $500 monthly and has been in business since 2006.

In order to increase his business capital and to expand his selling capacity, Ibraheem asked Ryada for this youth loan. He plans to buy a new fishnet and a small boat.

He hopes that this loan will lead him to support the needs of his family and to be able to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to buy a new fishnet and a small boat.

loans.name: Abu Al-Fadhl Group

texts.en: Abu Al-Fadhl consists of four ladies from Sana`a, Yemen. They have requested a group loan of 160,000 YER, and they will hold each other accountable for the loan repayments. Malok is a 29-year-old woman. She is a very kind person, hard-working and enthusiastic. She is a housewife who strives to raise her children well. Unfortunately she is unable to buy what she needs because of a lack of economic resources. She intends to buy home appliances to use in her house. She applied for a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB. With this loan, she will live a comfortable life. She hopes to accumulate money to improve the living conditions of her family and open a savings account.

loans.use: to buy home appliances to use in her house.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 41-year-old divorced man. He lives with his older son in Tulkarem, which is a Palestinian city in the West Bank. Mohammad works at the construction field, which has helped him do some work on his house. He asked Ryada for this loan to buy flagstones to pave his house with because he doesn't have enough money to pay for these with cash. Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to buy flagstones with which to pave his house.

loans.name: Basam

texts.en: Basam is a young man who is 28 years old and lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is still single and lives with his parent. He is a university student. Basam bought his mini-truck three years ago with a small amount of capital so that he could start his life and cover his own personal and educational expenses as well as save for marriage. He faced a financial challenge when the income from his transportation business was used to support his studies and then his mini-truck broke down. He became unable to cover the cost of maintenance. Then he took a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to repair his mini-truck. He is planning to save for marriage.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his mini-truck.

loans.name: Naghada

texts.en:
Naghada, is a 31-year-old widow. She has one child .After her husband’s death four years ago she had no source of income to support herself and her child, but she was a strong woman and promised herself to provide the best life for her child. She rented a small room in a school and started her business by selling juice, sandwiches, and biscuits to the students.
When she heard about Izdiharona's product for widowed women (a no interest product) she took a loan to renovate her workplace to increase her profit.
She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits to provide a good life for her child.
The story of Naghada and her business is just one of the many clients of Izdiharona for Economic Development.
She asked to blur her face for cultural reasons.

loans.use: to renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Nasrin

texts.en:
Nasrin is a 64-year-old widow and mother of two boys. After her husband’s death she had no source of income to support herself. She decided to start her own business to support herself and her sons. She bought a sewing machine and gained a good reputation in the neighborhood, thanks to the quality of her work.
When she heard about Izdiharona's qard hassan product for widowed women (a no interest product) she took a loan to buy a sewing machine, over machine, iron and table to increase her profit.
She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits and open a larger place for sewing.
The story of Nasrin and her sewing business is just one of the many client examples from Izdiharona for Economic Development.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, over machine, iron and table.

loans.name: Brigida Sobeida

texts.es: Brigida Sobeida mayor de edad casada con tres hijas menores de edad, originaria de uno de los municipios de chinandega zona ubicada en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, responsable y con muchos deseos de supercion personal. es una microempresaria quien es propietaria y administradora de una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitación donde comercializa todo tipo productos del consumidor como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, golosinas, gaseosas, leche, embutidos, productos perecederos,productos congelados entre otros, cuenta con el salario que recibe de dar clases en medio tiempo, aprovechando para comercializar mercadería en general por encargos siendo sus clientes fijos mayormente asalariados y otros, Brigida inicia su su negocio con capital propios viendo la necesidad de poder aportar un poco mas en su hogar, uno de sus anhelos es poder construir un cuarto de habitación para proveerle privacidad a sus hijas, y crecer en su negocio, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en la pulperia en la compra de: productos básicos, queso, pollo carnes, embutidos entre otros.
texts.en:
Brigida Sobeida is married and has three adult children.  She is from the town of Chinandega, located in the west of the country, and she is known as a very enterprising, responsible woman with many desires to get ahead.  She is a small businesswoman who owns a store, where she sells all sorts of products, such as rice, sugar, beans, cooking oil, snacks, soft drinks, milk, sausages, perishable products, frozen products, and other things.  She also teaches part time and takes orders for products from her steady salaried customers and others.

Brigida started her business with her own capital, having seen the need to bring in a little more income.  One of her greatest desires is to build a room onto her home so she can provide more privacy to her daughters, and also to grow the business over time.  She will use the money from this loan to buy basic products such as cheese, chicken, meats, sausages, and other things for her store.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Mabel Roxana

texts.es:
Mabel de 27 años de edad, madres solteras con un hijo menor de edad, es originaria de  La Paz Centro, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país.  La Paz Centro se caracteriza por su comida típica “el quesillo”  Mabel ha demostrado su responsabilidad, y ganas de salir adelante.  Lamentablemente por falta de empleos fijos, no había encontrado trabajo, hasta que decisión emprender su negocio por la necesidad de generar ingresos para los gastos de su hijo. En la actualidad ha sabido aprovechar sus recursos y  la motivación más grande que tiene es poder sacar adelante a su pequeño hijo y brindarle un futuro mejor.

Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de artesanía como¨ jarrones, casas de barro, floreros, adornos de cocina, alcancillas, cisne de barro, adornos de jardín, maceteros.  Ella dedica a su negocio unas 10 horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de artesanía, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Mabel agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva ofrecen a las personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Mabel is 27 years old and is a single mother with a young son. She originally comes from La Paz Centro, which is situated in the west of the country and is known for its typical food which is "quesillo" [tortilla with cream cheese filling].

Mabel has shown she is responsible and has a desire to get on in life. Unfortunately due to a lack of regular employment she had been unable to find work until she decided to start her business because she needed an income to spend on her son. Now she has learnt how to make good use of her resources and her biggest motivation is to be able to bring her little son up well and give him a better future. Thanks to her hard work and desire to get on in life she has a business selling crafts such as vases, clay houses, kitchen decorations, piggy banks, clay swans, garden ornaments and plant pots. She spends 10 hours a day working to sell her products. 

The purpose of the loan is to have working capital and stock her business buying and selling crafts, so that in the not-too-distant future she will be able to make more income. 

Mabel thanks the Kiva lenders for the help they offer to people of limited resources in poor countries such as Nicaragua so they can have a decent job.

loans.use: to have working capital and stock her business buying and selling crafts such as: vases, clay houses, kitchen decorations, piggy banks, clay swans, garden ornaments and plant pots.

loans.name: Warmicuna Llanqanchis Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WARMICUNA LLAQANCHIS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bibiana ella es soltera y tiene 57 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta y crianza de animales y también la socia tiene una tienda de abarrotes donde vende arroz,azúcar,leche y galletas, la socia cría los cuyes y gallinas los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes y gallinas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los cuyes y gallinas.
 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, negocio de venta de artesania, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are members of the “WARMICUNA LLAQANCHIS” communal bank, situated in the district of Anta, which belongs to Anta province and Cusco department.

Bibiana, who is a member, is 57 years old, is single and has 3 children. She works in her business selling and rearing animals and also has a grocery shop where she sells rice, sugar, milk and biscuits. Bibiana breeds the chickens and guinea pigs, grows them on then fattens them and sells them at the various markets. Thanks to her small business she is able to bring up her children. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell the chickens and guinea pigs.

Bibiana is asking for the loan to buy chickens and guinea pigs and feed for them. The other members have businesses selling beauty products, selling crafts, a grocery shop and selling animals.

Bibiana is grateful to those who are helping her achieve her dream in this way and promises to pay her instalments in the agreed timeframe.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens and feed for them.

loans.name: Tynar

texts.ru: Тынар 48 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Тынар - высшее образование, она и ее супруг работают преподавателями в местной школе, пользуются большим уважением в селе, так как супруги очень хорошие люди и профессиональные учителя. С них берут пример, так как они не только работают в школе, но и занимаются параллельно животноводством, а также обрабатывают 3,0 ГА земельной доли. Инициатором всего этого выступает Тынар, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Тынар, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 4 теленка, 20 овец, 1 лошадь, а также имеет земельный надел размером 3,0 ГА, на котором выращивает тыкву, картофель и многолетнюю траву. Также в зимний период реализует молоко. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). Тынар входит в группу "Диана", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. Тынар является вторым членом группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тынар обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Тынар планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку дома для старшего сына.
texts.en:
Tynar is 48 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Tynar has a higher education. She and her husband work as teachers at a local school and are well-respected in their village, as they both are good people and professional educators. They are good role models, as they not only work in a school, but also simultaneously practice animal breeding and cultivate a 3.0 hectare plot of land. 

Tynar was the initiator of all this, starting this business business 20 years ago with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Tynar's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows, 4 calves, 20 sheep and 1 horse on her farm, as well as a 3.0 hectare plot of land on which she grows pumpkins, potatoes and perennial grasses. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). Tynar is in the agricultural group "Diana." There are two other members in this group; Tynar is the second member of the group. 

For the purpose of further developing her business, Tynar turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy heifers to increase the size of her herd. Tynar plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a house for her eldest son.

loans.use: to buy heifers.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 20 years old. He lives in a village in Palestine west of Ramallah with his family. Mohammad works in the public sector. His salary is around $400 per month. He asked Ryada for this loan to repair his house. He wants to repair his ceiling, electricity and the windows because Mohammad wants to get married soon. This will give him step forward to get the house ready faster. 

Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to repair his house.

loans.name: Kelvin Ramon

texts.es:
Kelvin Ramón es un joven estudiante de Medicina, el esta solicitando un préstamo para poder pagar sus estudios, esta es su historia Mi nombre es Kelvin y tengo 21 años de edad. Actualmente resido en la ciudad de Santo Domingo en casa de una amiga de la familia, nací en la provincia de Barahona, sur de la Rep. Dominicana, emigrando de mi provincia en busca de cumplir el sueño que he deseado desde pequeño, ser doctor. Mi familia no es numerosa, ya que solo tengo 1 hermano.
Actualmente me encuentro cursando el 2do cuatrimestre de Medicina en la Universidad Tecnológica de Santiago (UTESA). Necesito el préstamo de FUNDAPEC Kiva, porque esta sería una gran ayuda para continuar mis estudios.
De recibir el préstamo Wao! Esta sería la oportunidad más grande en mi vida, ya que no tendré obstáculos  para pagar la universidad y así pudiera continuar estudiando la carrera que tanto me gusta, y en un futuro ser lo que siempre he anhelado, Dr. en medicina en el área de Pediatría, ya que me encantan los niños.
Luego de terminar mi carrera, mi objetivo principal es dar lo mejor de mi día a día, de todo lo que aprendí en mi trayecto de enseñanza a cada ser humano que me toque examinar, haciéndolo con paciencia, entrega, dedicación y sobre todo muchísimo amor, para aliviar el dolor de quienes acudan a mí a buscar su mejoría.

Kelvin
texts.en:
Kelvin Ramón is a young medicine student and is applying for a loan in order to pay for his studies.  

This is Kelvin's story:

"My name is Kelvin and I am 21 years old.  I currently live in the city of Santo Domingo, in the house of a friend of the family.  I was born in the Barahona province in the south of the Dominican Republic.  I left my home province in the hope of achieving my lifelong dream of becoming a doctor.  My family is not very big - I have only one brother.

"I am currently in second semester, studying medicine at the Universidad Tecnológica de Santiago (UTESA).  I need this loan from FUNDAPEC and Kiva because it would be a great help for me to continue my studies.

"Receiving this loan would be amazing! This would be the biggest opportunity I have had in my life. I would have no obstacles to overcome to pay university fees and so I could continue studying the degree that I like so much.  Then, in the future, I can become what I have always wanted to be - a paediatrics doctor, as I love children.

"After finishing my degree, my objective is to do my best every day - with everything I learn in my studies I want to do the best for everyone I have to treat.  I will work with patience, dedication and, above all, with lots of love, so that I can relieve the pain of those who come to me in order to get better."

Kelvin

loans.use: to buy university fees for his degree in medicine.

loans.name: Joan Nauel

texts.es:
Joan Nauel es un joven estudiante de Publicidad, el esta solicitando un prestamo para poder pagar sus estudios, esta es su historia:Mi nombre es JOAN y tengo 18 años. Nací, crecí en San Juan de la Maguana, en la Republica Dominicana. Tengo 5 hermanos; mi madre es estilista y mi papa actualmente no trabaja por problemas de salud, pero me han inculcado valores que me han ayudado a desarrollarme como persona y como profesional.


Quiero estudiar en la Universidad APEC en Santo Domingo, capital de la Republica Dominicana y estudiare Publicidad, ya que es la carrera que me gusta, me apasiona y en la que más me siento identificado, puesto que crecí conociendo el mundo de la comunicación y el medio artístico y fui desarrollando esa pasión por el arte.


Necesito el préstamo para poder costear mis estudios y gastos durante el mismo, ya que no cuento con trabajo y el salario de mis padres no son suficientes para costear mis estudios. La verdad no se que haría si no recibiera el préstamo porque siempre he querido estudiar en esa universidad. Este préstamo me ayudara a estudiar la carrera que me apasiona.
\

Mi meta académica es graduarme y ser reconocido como el mejor publicista de mi país. Pretendo también ayudar a mi familia económicamente y después de terminar la carrera, me gustaría trabajar en mi área; en una agencia publicitaria o en el área de comunicación.
texts.en:
Joan Nauel is a young publicity student who is requesting a loan to pay for his studies. This is his story:

My name is Joan and I am 18 years old. I was born and raised in San Juan de la Maguana in the Dominican Republic. I have five siblings; my mother is a stylist and my father is not working at the moment due to health problems, but they have instilled values in me that have helped me to develop on a personal and professional level.

I want to  study at the APEC University in Santo Domingo, the capital of the Dominican Republic, and study Publicity, as this is the course that appeals to me and which I am passionate about. I identify most with this course because I grew up in a world of communication and show business, which further developed my passion for the arts.


I need this loan to fund my studies and expenses during the course since I no longer work and my parents' salary is not enough to fund my studies. The truth is that I don't know what I will do if I don't get this loan because I have always wanted to study at that university and this loan would help me to study the course that I am passionate about.

My academic goal is to graduate and be recognised as the best publicist in my country. I would also like to help my family financially and after finishing my course I would like to work in my area as a publicity agent or in the field of communication.

loans.use: to pay for uni fees and books for his studies in Publicity

loans.name: Rita Alexandra

texts.es:
Rita Alexandra es una joven estudiante de Enfermeria, ella esta solicitando un prestamo para poder pagar sus estudios, esta es su historia:Mi nombre es Rita, vivo en Monte Bonito, Cienfuegos, Rep. Dom. Vivo con mi madre, hermana, tía y prima. Soy soltera y no tengo hijos.
Soy una joven que requiere de su apoyo para poder obtener nuevos conocimientos que me permitan mi desarrollo personal y laboral; desarrollar al máximo mis potencialidades y obtener un titulo universitario.
Tengo escaso recursos, mis padres no me pueden sustentar mis estudios ya que mi padre no gana lo suficiente.
Quiero seguir cursando mis estudios en Lic. Enfermería en la Universidad Tecnológica de Santiago (UTESA), elegí esta carrera porque puedo realizarme y proyectarme como una profesional ya que es mi vocación, dándoles a los usuarios la dedicación que necesitan. Empecé esta carrera en enero 2013, curse mi primer cuatrimestre y no pude seguir por falta de recursos.
 Este préstamo es muy necesario porque me ayudará a seguir cursando mis estudios; de manera tal  que  podría realizarme profesionalmente y Seré  útil a mi familia y  la sociedad, se que este préstamo cambiaria mi vida ya que  obtendré una mano amiga en la que podré confiar y lograr mis objetivos.
Mis metas y sueños son, terminar mis estudios universitarios, maestría etc. Ayudar  mi familia, brindar mi mayor desempeño profesional.
texts.en:
Rita Alexandra is a young nursing student. She is asking for a loan to be able to pay for her studies, this is her story:

My name is Rita, I live in Monte Bonito, Cienfuegos, in the Dominican Republic. I live with my mother, sister, aunt and cousin. I am not married and have no children. I am a young woman who needs your support to be able to learn new things which will contribute to my personal and professional development; and develop fully my potential and obtain a degree. I do not have a lot of money, and my parents cannot fund my studies as my father does not earn enough. I want to continue my studies for a nursing degree at the Technological University of Santiago (UTESO). I chose this course because I can become and present myself as a professional, since it is my vocation, giving patients the dedication they need. I started this course in January 2013, I was in my first semester, and I could not afford to continue studying.

This loan is much needed because it will help me continue my studies so that I will become a professional, and I will be useful to my family and society. I know that this loan will change my life as I will obtain a lifeline that I can trust and so achieve my goals. My aims and dreams are to finish my studies at university, my masters etc, help my family and do my job as best I can.

loans.use: to pay for registration, transport and books for her nursing course.

loans.name: Cecilia Marleny

texts.es:
Cecilia Marleny es una joven estudiante de Medicina, ella esta solicitando un prestamo para poder pagar sus estudios, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Cecilia, tengo 19 años de edad. Nací en La vega pero vivo en Santo Domingo, soy soltera, no tengo hijos y soy la mayor de tres hermanos, entre ellos una hermana, con edades de 14, 15 y 17 años.
A la edad de 15 años, mis padres se divorciaron, quedando mi madre con todos los gastos y necesidades del hogar. Mi padre vive de la renta y otros negocios; mi madre cuida niños y tiene una sala de tarea a su cargo.
Estudio en UCATECI en la carrera de medicina. Me interesa esta carrera porque hay que poner en práctica diversos valores como la humildad, solidaridad, responsabilidad, entre otras. Además, es una carrera de mucha dedicación y con el que se le puede expresar amor al prójimo.
Este préstamo es de suma importancia para cubrir las necesidades de la Universidad, y de no recibirlo, tendré que dejar la carrera porque no cuento los recursos para costearla, es muy costosa. De modo que si me lo aprueban, me cambiaría la vida totalmente ya que me dará más fuerzas para continuar con la misma. Desde niña he soñado con ser doctora.
Una de mis metas es poder desarrollarme como una profesional exitosa, después hacer mi especialidad en pediatría, de este modo ejercerla con todas las herramientas que me permitan realizar un excelente trabajo, y así poner mi ciudad y mi país en alto.
texts.en:
Cecilia Marleny is a young woman studying medicine. She is requesting a loan to pay for her studies. This is her story:

My name is Cecilia, I am nineteen years old. I was born in La Vega, but I live in Santo Domingo. I am single and do not have kids. I am the oldest at home. I have a sister and two brothers, aged 14, 15 and 17. 

When I was fifteen my parents got divorced and my mother had to cover all the expenses at home. My father receives an income and has other businesses; my mother babysits and administers a workshop.

I am studying medicine at UCATECI. I am interested in this profession because it demands from people to be humble, responsible and to care about others, among other values. Besides, it requires a lot of dedication and gives you the opportunity to show you love your neighbors.

This loan is of great importance in order to cover my needs at the university. In case I do not get it, I would have to interrupt my studies because I do not have the resources to continue since it costs a lot to do so. This is to say that it would totally change my life to get it and I would have the strengths I need to pursue my degree. Ever since I was a girl I have dreamt of becoming a doctor.

One of my goals is to be able to become a successful professional, specialized in Pediatrics. Once I have all the tools, I will be able to perform an excellent job and honor my city and my country.

loans.use: to pay for her studies in Medicine.

loans.name: Pakhshan

texts.en:
Pakhshan is a 52-year-old widow and mother of three boys. After her husband’s death eight years ago, she had no source of income to support herself. So she decided to start her own business and bought an old sewing machine to support herself and her sons. However, the business did not enable her to make enough money and she couldn't provide for her sons' needs. After that, her sons dropped out of school to help her with the family expenses.

When she heard about Izdiharona's loan product for widowed women (without interest) she took a loan to buy a sewing machine to increase her profits.

She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits.

The story of Pakhshan and her sewing business is just one of the many examples of Izdiharona's clients.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Rozhgar

texts.en:
Rozhgar is a 26-year-old divorced woman. She has one child. When she got divorced, she went back and lived with her parents. Because of her parents' low income, they had hard time supporting two additional members. She decided to start her own business to support her parents and child. She bought a sewing machine and gained a good reputation in the neighborhood, thanks to the quality of her work.

When she heard about Izdiharona's qard hasan (interest-free) loans for divorced women, she took a loan to replace her old sewing machine and buy an overlock sewing machine (serger) to increase her profits.
