Evelyn is single, and due to the need to generate income to pay her personal expenses, she set up a business where she offers products for sale that her customers need.  She tends to the business from 6am until 7pm.  For her, this schedule isn't a problem.

With this investment, she will buy snacks and sodas so that she can have a variety of products that her customers can afford.  Her sales will increase, and her earnings will ensure that she has the resources to pay off the debt.

Evelyn dreams of expanding her business and offering more products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy snacks and sodas

loans.name: Nyshankul

texts.ru: Нышанкул 54 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали 5 детей, все дети женаты, проживают отдельно и самостоятельно. С Нышанкул проживает младший сын со снохой. Супруг -дальнобойщик, занимается перевозкой грузов. У Нышанкул - среднее образование, по характеру она хваткая и неунывающая женщина. В настоящее время занимается перепродажей овощей на местном рынке. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Нышанкул занимается еще и животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад, с покупки скота на 12,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Нышанкул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 нетели. Ежемесячный доход составляет 9,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нышанкул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Нышанкул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на улучшение семейного состояния.
texts.en: Nyshankul is 54, married, and has raised 5 children together with her husband. All of the children are married, and live on their own. Nyshankul lives with her youngest son and daughter-in-law. Her husband is a truck driver. Nyshankul has a high school education; she is a positive and cheerful woman. Currently she sells vegetables at the local market. For extra income, she also raises livestock. She began this 9 years ago, when she bought a cow for 12,000 som KGS. Thanks to her efforts, her farm now has 2 dairy cows and 2 heifers. Her monthly income is 9,000 som (KGS). TO further develop her business, Nyshankul has come to the Bai-Tushum & Partners microlending bank for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle to increase her livestock count. Nyshankul plans on investing the income obtained with the loan into further increasing her livestock count, and plans on saving money to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Rowena works hard to support her family.

She has a clothing sales business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling used clothes. Rowena is borrowing 7,000 PHP [Philippines pesos] through NWTF in order to purchase more items like pants, blouses, T-shirts and perfume.

Rowena has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like pants, blouses, T-shirts and perfume.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 39 años de edad, habita en casa sencilla junto a su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos. Para Juan su familia es su principal prioridad y por ella hace todo lo que esté a su alcance para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Él se dedica a la albañilería y gracias al buen trabajo que realiza muchas personas lo prefieren y demandan sus servicios. Con el fin de mejorar poco a poco sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un corredor ya que cuando llueve el agua se le filtra y daña sus pocas pertenencias. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, grava y arena ya que también va a encementar el piso del mismo.
texts.en:
Juan is 39 years old and lives with his wife and their two children in their own home. For Juan, family is the most important aspect of life, and he works extremely hard to provide all he can for his family. Juan works as a mason, and thanks to the high quality work he does, his skills are in high demand. 

With the support from this loan, Juan plans to purchase construction materials that will allow him to lay cement floor over the dirt floor of his home and build a hallway to protect his family's few possessions from rain damage. He plans to purchase wood, cement, gravel, sand and galvanized metal laminated sheets for his construction project.

loans.use: to purchase wood, cement, gravel, sand and galvanized metal laminated sheets for laying a cement floor and building a hallway onto his home.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es: Lucas agradece a los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y está contenta,  él continúa con la agricultura y ganadería, él continua siendo parte del banco comunal porque es una persona responsable y alegre. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar  fertilizantes y semillas. Agradece a todas las personas por el préstamo pues se compromete a pagar puntual sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Lucas continues his work as a farmer tending crops and raising cattle, and he also continues his involvement as a member of the community bank. Lucas is a cheerful, responsible person who works extremely hard to provide for his family. 

With the support from this loan, Lucas plans to purchase fertilizers and seeds for use in tending his crops. He is very grateful for this opportunity and promises to make all scheduled loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds for his farming operation.

loans.name: Chiltoma Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias microempresarias de éxito una de ellas es María Elena, soltera, tiene 48 años su negocio es la venta de derivados del maíz y venta de gallina, sus productos los comercializa en su domicilio y en el mercado de Masaya  desde hace 1 año, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 2 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima como maíz, leña, azúcar, hojas, bolsas de gabacha, etc. Teresa mujer de 42 años su negocio es la venta de almidón y Verónica mujer de 38 años su negocio es la venta de nacatamales.
texts.en:
The Chiltoma group is made up of three successful, entrepreneurial women, one of whom is María Elena. María Elena is 48 years old and makes a living selling corn-based foods and chickens. She prepares her food dishes in her home and then sells them in the market in Masaya. María Elena has been a member of the community bank for two years and has been working at her business for one year. 

With the support from this loan, María Elena plans to purchase input materials for making and packaging her corn-based dishes, including: corn, sugar, wood, leaves, plastic bags, etc. The other two groups members are Teresa, who is 42 years old and makes a living selling starch, and Verónica, who is 38 years old and makes a living selling corn-based nacatamales.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her business, including corn, sugar, wood, leaves, plastic bags, etc.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is a young entrepreneur with a child. She runs a retail business where she sells plastic ware, cosmetics, and other home-use products. Jasmin earns enough to provide for her family’s needs. She joined GDMPC.

Jasmin is requesting a loan to purchase more stocks such as plastic ware to sell. In the future, she wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase plastic ware

loans.name: Nidia Maria

texts.es: Doña Nidia es originaria de la ciudad de Granada, tiene 38 años de edad. Madre soltera de un hijo. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Negocio que inicio hace pocos años con los ingresos de su ex esposo, lo cual iba comprando poco a poco. Luego con el apoyo de su papa’ fue comprando las cosas necesarias para su negocio. Actualmente con sus ganancias obtenidas ha logrado mantener un crecimiento en su negocio. Su meta es trabajar siempre para que su negocio sea una gran pulpería. Solicita el crédito para  comprar  productos básicos: arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, jabón entre otros, con el fin de cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Estima que este crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que lograra surtir sus productos y obtener mejores ventas. Su plan futuro es seguir creciendo su negocio con la adquisición de nuevos y más productos.
texts.en: Nidia comes from the town of Granada and is 38 years old. She is a single mother and has one son. She owns a grocery shop, a business she started a few years ago with her ex-husband's income. At the beginning, she bought groceries gradually, and then, thanks to her father's help, she was able to buy what she needed for her shop. With her profits, she has managed to make her business grow steadily. She always work with one goal in mind: to see her shop become an emporium. She asks for the loan in order to buy basic products to sell, such as rice, broad beans, cooking oil, sugar, and soap, in order to meet customer demand. She thinks the loan will be a great help since it will enable her to buy more stock and increase her sales. Her plan for the future is to make her shop grow by offering more and more products.

loans.use: to buy basic groceries to sell.

loans.name: Marcos Tulio

texts.es:
Marcos, es n señor de 38 años de edad, está acompañado, tiene cinco hijos, algunos ya están a punto de graduarse de bachillerato, se dedica a vender sorbete, es un oficio que aprendió de sus hermano, trabaja de lunes a sábado sin horario.
Invertirá en la compra de sorbete, paletas, vasitos, etc., por mayor para tener un inventario muy surtido que le permita trabajar por un tiempo sin limitantes, tendrá más clientes satisfechos, ganancias abundantes que le servirán para cambiar el estilo de vida de su familia y cancelar la deuda.
Sueña con que su negocio sea más grande y que su familia tenga una mejor alimentación, salud y educación de calidad para sus hijos.
texts.en: Marcos is 38 and has a wife. They have five children, some of whom are about to finish school. He sells ice-cream, a trade he learned from his brother, and works from Monday to Saturday, with no fixed hours. He will use the loan to buy ice-cream, plastic spoons, and cups wholesale, in order to have much more stock, which will enable him to work for a while without having to worry about inventory. He foresees satisfied customers and increased profits as a result. He will be able to give his family a better life and to repay the loan. He dreams of a bigger business and a better-fed family, and healthy and well-educated children.

loans.use: to buy ice-cream, plastic spoons, and cups.

loans.name: Palao

texts.en:
Palao is 35 years old and has one child who is in school.

She earns a living by farming coconut in the Philippines. Palao is borrowing 15,000 PHP [Philippines pesos] through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Palao has been farming coconut for six years and also earns additional income from buying and selling Avon products. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Rodelia

texts.en:
Rodelia is 34 years old, married, and has five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She sells nipa roofing in the Philippines, which she has been doing for six years. She earns additional income from selling fruits. 

Rodelia is requesting her tenth loan from NWTF for 19,000 PHP, which she will use to buy additional nipa roofing product to sell. Rodelia hopes to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase nipa roofing products to sell

loans.name: Rolina

texts.en:
Rolina is married and has a business buying and selling crabs in the Philippines. She has operated her business for the past 10 years and works hard to support her family. 

Rolina is requesting a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional crabs to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy crabs to sell

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 45 years old and married with six children. For the past four years, she has farmed coconuts in the Philippines and she also earns additional income from buying and selling rice. 

Rowena is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Vazira

texts.ru: Вазире 25 лет. Она из города Душанбе. Вазира берет заказы на шитье одежды. Ее этому мастерству научила ее мама. Но мама Вазиры сама не занимается шитьем. Она работает в детском садике воспитательницей. Но когда она проводит время дома, она помогает Вазире по работе. Вазара работает на дому. Таджикские женщины предпочитают надевать платья на заказ. Поэтому услуги швеи и портнихи являются востребованными. Вазира почти 4 года занимается такой деятельностью и довольна своей работой, но ее швейная машинка сильно устарела и она хочет на деньги от кредита купить новую машинку. Вазира надеется, что с появлением новой швейной машинки ей будет удобно шить и еще приятнее работать.
texts.en:
Vazira is 25 years old. She is from the city of Dushanbe. Vazira takes orders for sewing clothing. Her mastery of this was learned from her mother. But Vazira's mother is not herself engaged in sewing. She works in a kindergarten as a teacher. But when she spends time at home, she helps Vazira with her work. Vazira works at home. Tajik women prefer to wear custom dresses. Therefore sewing services and dressmaking are in demand.

For almost four years, Vazira has been engaged in such activities and is satisfied with her work, but her sewing machine is seriously outdated and she wants to buy a new machine with the money from the loan. Vazira hopes that with the arrival of a new sewing machine she will be able to comfortable sew and it will be more pleasant to work.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Ana Rafaela

texts.es: Ana de 43 años de edad reside junto a su esposo, sus dos hijos, 3 nietos, su nuera y su madre. Habita en casa humilde pero propia. Desde hace mucho tiempo aprendió el oficio de elaboración de comales y ollas a base de barro y este ha sido su principal fuente de ingresos. Todos los días se dedica a la elaboración de variedad de comales y ollas de forma artesanal. Gracias a su carisma ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. El techo de su vivienda se encuentra dañado por lo que necesita hacer el cambio lo antes posible. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y pago de mano de obra. Espera poder contar con este apoyo y así dar a su familia condiciones habitacionales más seguras.
texts.en:
Ana is 43 years old and lives with her husband, two children, three nephews, daughter in law, and mother.  She lives in a humble home of her own and learned to make artisan griddles and clay pots a long time ago and this has been her main source of income.  She does this daily and thanks to her charisma, she has been able to win the trust of many customers who prefer to buy from her.

The roof over her house is damaged and she needs to replace it as soon as possible, so she is asking for a loan through FUSAI so she can buy galvanized metal, lumber, and pay for labor.  She hopes to be able to count on this support so she can provide safer living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy roofing materials.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es: Don Rolando es un señor muy trabajador, el todas las mañanas camina muchos kilómetros para ir a su finca a sembrar, sin embargo esto le deja poco tiempo para compartir con su familia y para aprovechar el tiempo cosechando. es por esto que él solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones (1.000.000) para comprar una motocicleta y poder viajar mas rápido a su finca y poder aprovechar mas el tiempo, y con esto lograr cosechar mas y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rolando is a hard-working man. Every morning he walks many kilometers to go to his farm to plant. However, this leaves him little time to share with his family and to maximize harvesting time. This is why he is asking for a loan of one million colons (1,000.000) to purchase a motorcycle so he can travel to his farm faster and make the most of his time. This will allow him to harvest more and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for transport

loans.name: Debora

texts.es: Doña Debora es dueña de una pequeña "pulperia" en su pueblo, ella ha vendido en la zona desde hace varios años, pero no ha tenido los ingresos para poder arreglar adecuadamente su negocio, es por ello que solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones (1.000.000) para comprar los materiales y pagar la mano de obra y así darle una mejor apariencia física a su negocio y con esto poder aumentar las ventas y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Debora owns a small convenience store in her village. She has been selling in the area for several years, but has not has the income to remodel her store adequately. This is why she is asking for a loan of one million colons (1.000.000) to purchase the materials and pay for the labor cost so she can give her business a better outward appearance. That way she will increase sales and will be able to provide better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase remodeling materials.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: A sus 20 años de edad Manuel se gana la vida trabajando como albañil y en una pequeña granja de pollos que ha logrado establecer dentro de su terreno. Manuel trabaja muy duro para lograr llevar el sustento a su hogar ya que de él depende la economía de su hogar. Habita en condiciones muy humildes las cuales poco a poco desea ir mejorando. Desea repellar las paredes de su vivienda las cuales están hechas a base de adobe y cuando llueve el agua las deteriora y las humedece dejándolas propensas a que cualquier insecto aniden en sus grietas.  Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena y cemento para repellar las paredes de su casa.
texts.en:
Manuel is 20 years old and makes a living working as a mason and raising a few chickens on his small plot of land. 

Little by little, Manuel is trying to make improvements to his simple home, and he hopes to leverage the support from this loan to purchase cement and sand to repair the walls of his home. Currently, the walls of his house are made of adobe, so when it rains, moisture and water seep into the walls and accelerate their deterioration and encourage insects to lay their eggs in the cracks. Manuel hopes this investment will help him to make his home more secure and comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase sand and cement for repairing the walls of his home.

loans.name: Delmy Lorena

texts.es: Delmy de 29 años de edad es madre soltera de tres  niños de 7 años, 10 años y 11 años de edad. Para ella lo más importante son sus hijos y es por ellos que trabaja duramente para llevar el sustento diario. Desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de verduras y este negocio ha sido y sigue siendo su principal fuente de ingresos. Su deseo es construir un cuarto en su terreno ya que su casa es pequeña y ya no da abasto para toda la familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento,  ladrillos, arena, grava y hierro para construir una nueva habitación. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no puede hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en:
Delmy is 29 years old and is a single mother to three children, ages 11, 10 and 7. Delmy's top priority in life is her children, and she works extremely hard to provide all she can for them. Eight years ago, Delmy started a business selling vegetables to support her children, and this business is still her primary source of income. 

With the support from this loan, Delmy plans to purchase building materials such as cement, bricks, sand, gravel, iron and other materials to aid in the construction of a room for her family's home. The small house Delmy and her children are living in is not big enough to fit them all comfortably, so Delmy hopes that this investment will improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks, sand, gravel and iron for building a room onto her home.

loans.name: Mukaddam

texts.en:
Mukaddam was born in 1961 and has been a widow for more than 10 years. She lives with her son and daughter-in-law and works processing and selling milk products. Mukaddam’s daughter-in-law helps her with managing business. She works from early morning till late evening but only earns a small income. Mukaddam’s son does not have a job in Tajikistan that’s why she wants to send him to Russia. 

Mukaddam is requesting a 4,000 TJS loan to buy an air ticket for her son. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy an air ticket for her son

loans.name: Urkuya

texts.ru: Уркуе 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 замечательных детей, дети все школьники, старшему 13 лет, младшему 9 лет. У Уркуи - средне-специальное образование, окончила техникум, по специальности "повар". Супруг занимается предоставлением пассажирских услуг местному населению. Семья молодая и дружная. Супруги учат детей с раннего возраста всем хорошим качествам и таким как трудолюбие. После школы дети помогают своим родителям. Уркуя в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи  занимается животноводством, стартовав 12 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Уркуи, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 теленок, и 30 овец, а также имеет 2,1 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает перец, фасоль и клевер. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Уркуя обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Уркуя планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей. Уркуя считает себя примерной супругой и счастливой мамой.
texts.en:
Urkuya is 32 years old, married, and with her husband is bringing up three wonderful children. The children are all students; the eldest is 13 years old, and the youngest is 9. Urkuya has a specialized high school education, and graduated from a technical school with the specialty of cook. Her husband is engaged in offering passenger services to the local population.

The family is young and friendly. The spouses have been teaching the children from a young age all the good qualities such as industriousness. After school, the children help their parents. As a main source of income for her family, Urkuya is engaged in raising livestock, having started 12 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 5,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Urkuya currently has on her homestead: two dairy cows, one calf, and 30 sheep, and also has a 2.1-hectare share of land, on which annually she grows peppers, beans and clover. Monthly income consists of 12,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Urkuya turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tusham and Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to purchase cows to increase her cattle head count.

Urkuya plans to invest income from the loan in further increasing the quantity of domestic livestock, and plans to save money for the further education of her children. Urkuya considers herself an exemplary mother and a happy mother.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 50 years old and married with four children. For the past five years, she has been raising pigs in the Philippines. Ruth has borrowed four previous loans from NWTF to sustain her business. 

Ruth is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 61 years old and married with three children.  For the past 14 years, she has been running a general store in the Philippines and also earns an income from mobile phone prepaid loading (E-loading). Evelyn has borrowed and repaid 18 previous loans from NWTF before this one.

Evelyn is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. In the future, she aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is 44 years old and married with six children. For the past 25 years, she has been a rice farmer in the Philippines and she also earns additional income from fattening pigs. 

Chona is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other supplies. She works tirelessly to attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Yelba Del Rosario

texts.es: Doña Yelba es originaria de la ciudad de Granada, madre de dos hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería, el cual le ha generado ingresos para su hogar y sobre todo para tener un negocio prospero. Esta agradecida con Kiva y Micrédito ya que le ayudo con los gastos del hogar y con la compra de sus productos, los cual ha sido fundamental para su negocio. Solicita un nuevo  Crédito para comprar: pollo, carne, arroz, azúcar, entre otros, con el fin de ofrecer más cantidad de productos. Estima que el crédito le será de ayuda ya que tendrá mejor crecimiento en sus ventas al igual que su pulpería.
texts.en:
Yelba is from the city of Granada and is the mother of two children. In order to generate income and provide for her children, Yelba runs a small general store. 

With the support from this loan, Yelba plans to purchase products to stock her general store, including: chicken, meat, rice, sugar, etc. She hopes that this investment will help her to increase the variety of products she offers to her clients, as well as strengthen and expand her business as a whole. Yelba is very grateful to Kiva and Micrédito for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, meat, rice, sugar and other items to stock her general store.

loans.name: Yoeng

texts.en:
Yoeng, 60, is married with nine children and resides in a rural village of the Ponhea Krek district of the Kampong Cham province. To support the family, she has been farming rice and growing cassava for 30 years. Together, she and her husband can earn about KHR 50,000 per day and can save about KHR 20,000 each day for future needs. 

This is the first micro loan for Yoeng with VisionFund. Now she is applying for a loan. She is going to use her loan to buy fertilizers for growing cassava. She hopes to grow more rice and cassava to increase her family’s income to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her cassava growing.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru:
Малике из Душанбе 44 года. Она замужем за таксиста. Малика предоставляет услуги портнихи. Она шьет дома, и клиентки приходят к ней домой. Малика любит свою работу и старается угодить своим клиенткам. Она начала шить и кроить 4 года назад. И с тех пор она не пожалела, что начала такую деятельность. По работе Малике помогает ее дочь, она тоже хочет научиться шить. 
   На данный момент Малике необходимы средства, чтобы купить новую швейную машинку. Она решила взять кредит. Потому что ее машинка совсем старая и хорошо не выполняет свои функции. Малика надеется, что новая машинка облегчит ее работу.
texts.en:
Malika from Dushanbe is 44 years old. She is married to a taxi driver. Malika offers dressmaking services. She sews at home, and customers come to her home. Malika loves her work and tries to please her clients. She began to sew and tailor four years ago. And since that time, she has never regretted that she began this type of activity. In Malika's work, she is helped by her daughter; she wants to learn to sew.

Currently, Malika needs resources to buy a new sewing machine. She decided to take a loan, because her machine is very old and does not fulfill its functions well. Malika hopes that a new machine will make her work easier.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es: Ofelia es separada con 06 hijos 01 de ellos aún dependiente. Ella pertenece a la Alcancía Comunal “Sarita Colonia” conformada por  07 socios que han ido mejorando cada día. A sus 53 años Ofelia ha logrado cumplir con algunos de sus sueños, como mejorar su vivienda y sacar adelante a sus hijos. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de de CD´s, la cual lo realiza en un mercado cerca de su localidad. Se siente feliz pues cada vez sigue mejorando sus ingresos. Su mayor deseo es de terminar de construir su vivienda para así poder instalar su puesto de CD´s. Solicitó el crédito para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, la cual comprará  CD´s  y de esta manera tener que ofrecer a sus clientes. El grupo “Sarita Colonia” está agradecido con el crédito brindado. Ofelia se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado derecho y viste polo blanco y chaleco color fucsia.
texts.en:
Ofelia is separated and has six children, one of whom is still her dependent. She belongs to the communal bank “Sarita Colonia”, which is made up of seven members who have been improving their lives every day. At age 53, Ofelia has managed to realize some of her dreams, like improving her home and providing for her children. Currently she is working selling CDs in a local market. She says she is happy because her income continues to improve each day. Her greatest wish is to finish the construction of her home so that she can install in it a place from which to sell her CDs.

Ofelia is requesting this loan to continue investing in her business by buying CDs to offer to her customers. The members of the communal bank “Sarita Colonia” say that they are grateful for this loan. In the photo, Ofelia is seated and is the first person from the right-hand side and is wearing a white shirt and fuchsia vest.

loans.use: to buy CDs for her business.

loans.name: Reyna Esperanza

texts.es: Reyna de 46 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto con su hija de tres años de edad. Reyna se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo. Todos los días sale a recorres las diferentes zonas de su localidad para ofrecer los productos. Gracias a su carisma y calidad de los productos que ofrece ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes quienes cada día le demandan. Desea asegurar su vivienda para lo cual quiere construir un muro perimetral. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de grava, cemento, arena, hierro y ladrillo y pago de mano de obra para la construcción del muro.
texts.en: Reyna is 46 years old. She is a single mother and leaves in a house she owns, together with her 3-year-old daughter. Reyna sells cosmetic products via catalog. Everyday she goes to the different areas of her town to offer her products. Thanks to her charisma and the quality of the products she offers, she has earned the trust of many clients who place orders every day. Reyna wants to secure her home, which is why she wants to build a perimeter wall. That is why she is asking the lending partner, FUSAI, for a loan to invest in the purchase of gravel, cement, sand, iron and brick and to pay the labor cost to build a new wall.

loans.use: to buy gravel, cement, sand, iron and brick and pay for labor costs to build a perimeter wall.

loans.name: Rigoberta

texts.es: Rigoberta de 48 años de edad habita en casa propia desde hace mucho tiempo. Habita en condiciones muy sencillas junto a su esposo y sus 5 hijos quienes son menores de edad y dependen de sus cuidados y economía. Rigoberta se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado e de su localidad y de esa forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Actualmente no cuenta con un lugar adecuado para reguardar el agua lo cual le genera doble trabajo y muchas veces desperdicios del vital líquido. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y ladrillo para construir una pila grande que le permita facilitar el resguardo del servicio del agua potable.
texts.en:
Rigoberta, 48, has been living in a house she owns for a long time. She lives a simple life together with her husband and five underage children, dependent on her care and economic support.

Rigoberta sells vegetables at the local market and this is how she maintains her family. She currently lacks a proper place to store water which results sometimes in extra work and even spillages of this vital liquid.

She is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy cement, sand and bricks to build a structure to store and protect the drinking water tanks.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and bricks to build a structure for her drinking water tanks.

loans.name: Sobira

texts.en:
Sobira is 31 years old and married with two small children. For the past 10 years, she has been a farmer who has her own land. Sobira is a hardworking woman and her husband helps with growing crops. She earns a small income and so she lives poorly and does not have money to buy winter clothing for herself or her children.

Sobira is requesting a 1,500 TJS loan to buy clothes for the winter season. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy winter clothing for herself and her family

loans.name: Malohat

texts.en:
Malohat is 43 years old. Her husband is a migrant in Russia, and they have three children. Malohat is a seamstress; she sews national mattress, called ‘kurpacha’, in her house. Also she helps her daughter-in-law with sewing national women dresses. She works hard, and that’s why she is ill now. She does not have money to buy medicine. 

She is asking for a loan to buy medicine for her treatment. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy medicine for her treatment

loans.name: Takhmina

texts.en:
Takhmina is sociable woman. She was born in 1981, and Takhmina is married and has three children. She is a careful mother and lovely wife. 

She earns money teaching at the local school. She is a good teacher. Takhmina is proud that she is a teacher. Her working day lasts till 5 o’clock in the afternoon but she gets a small salary. 

Her husband is an entrepreneur. They want to repair their house because it is in bad condition. Takhmina always wanted to provide her children with a good living condition but nowadays she has no money. She is asking for a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy building materials such as cement, wood, and paint for repairing house. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, wood, and paint for repairing her house

loans.name: Jhielchearl

texts.en: Jhielchearl lives in Dumagoc, Pagadian with her family. She is a 19-year-old student in Southern Mindanao College taking up a BSBA. Her parents work as government employees in town while her brother and sister are still studying. Last semester, Jhielchearl took her previous loan from GDMPC covering the costs of her school tuition fees. She always find ways just to continue her dream. Recently, she requested a new loan to pay the school fees for the second semester. Jhielchearl is hopeful not only to continue her studies, but to finish and be able to work for a better future.

loans.use: to pay the school fees for the second semester

loans.name: Bisayram

texts.en:
Bisayram is 38 years old, married, and has four children. She lives with her family in the center of North Tajikistan. Her husband is a driver. Bisayram is a sewer. She sews national women dresses and sells them in a local market, which she has been doing for more than 21 years. She likes her job and has her own customers who prefer her products. 

Bisayram tries to provide her children with better living conditions. She wants to repair her house and is requesting a loan for 1,500 somoni, which she will use to buy building materials for repairs.

loans.use: to purchase building materials for repairing house

loans.name: Sukali Dioffior Group

texts.fr:
Sukali Diofior est le nom donné à un regroupement  de femmes habitant le même village et qui sont au nombre de quatre.
La principale activité du groupe, est le commerce.
La présidente, la dame qui a levé la main, s’active dans la vente de bijoux : bracelet, boucle d’oreille, chaine, cela depuis cinq ans maintenant.  Elle s’appelle Fatou, elle est âgée de la quarantaine, mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont l’ainé est âgé de 21 ans. Fatou reste active toute la journée. Avant de voyager, elle recueille les besoins des clients, ce qui fait que la marchandise ne restera pas invendue longtemps.
C’est grâce à cette activité que Fatou peut gérer sa famille en l’absence de son époux qui est hors de la région. Elle a donc le devoir de veiller à l’alimentation de ses enfants et à leur éducation.
Fatou, qui possède déjà un cheval et quelques moutons veut renforcer cette activité. Elle aimerait aussi aménager un petit espace pour exposer sa marchandise (bijoux).
texts.en:
Sukali Diofior is the name of a group of four women who live in the same village. The main business of the group is retail.

The woman who's raising her hand in the photograph is the president of the group. She's been selling jewelry (bracelets, earrings, necklaces, etc) for five years. Her name is Fatou, she's in her forties, married, and the mother of seven children. The eldest is 21 years old.

Fatou is working throughout the day. Before traveling, she collects her customer's needs, which means that her products don't take long to sell out.

Thanks to this business, Fatou can provide for her family while her husband is away, outside of the region. She has to take care of her children's food and schooling expenses.

Fatou owns a horse and a few sheep. She wants to bolster this business. She would also like to set up a place to display her products (jewelry).

loans.use: to buy jewelry

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Rosie works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from farming rice.  Rosie is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Rosie has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from machine repair.  Narcisa is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Narcisa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 56 years old and married with seven children. For the past seven years, she has been running a general store in the Philippines and she also earns an income from fishing. Adelaida works hard to provide for her family and has borrowed and repaid five previous loans through NWTF. 

Adelaida is requesting a 27,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, soap, and other products. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, soap, and other products

loans.name: Kalamo Group

texts.fr: La cliente Sharlotte est une commerçante et membre d’une association  d’affaires «Kalamo », femme vivant seule (sans aucun mari), âgée de 35 ans, mère des cinq enfants qui tous étudient. Elle est vendeuse de l’arachide depuis deux ans. Elle a sollicité un crédit auprès de Hekima. Elle va acheter 30 kg d’arachide pour accroitre ses activités. Elle avait commencé avec ses fonds propre reçu de son petit ami. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite acheter  une parcelle et scolariser ses enfants. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux femmes  entrepreneurs en leur accordant des microcrédits sans garantie matérielle pendant ce moment de conflits armés  à l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
This client, Sharlotte, is a merchant and a member of the business association "Kalamo". She is a woman living by herself (without a husband), 35 years old, and the mother of five children, who are all students. She has been a peanuts vendor for two years. She is requesting a loan from Hekima. She is going to purchase 30 kg of peanuts to grow her business. She had started off with her own funds from a friend. 

For the future, she would like to purchase a parcel of land and to provide education to her children. Thus, she thanks Hekima for supporting women entrepreneurs by granting them microloans without the need for collateral during this time of armed conflict in the country's east.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Carminda

texts.es:
Carminda es una mujer muy trabajadora de 38 años de edad, en un estado civil (Unión libre) siendo su conyugue constructor y agricultor, su grado de educación es primaria completa y no tienen hijos viviendo únicamente ellos 2 en casa. Carminda Es comerciante y agricultora trabajando durante la semana en el campo apoyando a su compañero de hogar en sus cultivos de café y los fines de semana ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado municipal de la zona. La propiedad que juntos trabajan es propia gracias a una herencia  por sus padres en la cual tiene una gran variedad de producto cultivado la cual está ubicada a 3 kilómetros de casa de habitación al cual se trasladan caminando ya que no hay un medio de trasporte. Carminda para esta temporada espera obtener una excelente cosecha ya que de esto depende la economía de su hogar, su producción la venden a los intermediarios que llegan a la localidad. Su Primordial propósito para poder solicitar financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL, es la compra de fertilizantes, abonos de diferentes fórmulas, fungicidas evitando de esta forma el contagio de plagas y el deterioro del producto. 
Sus planes para el futuro, destinar un poco de las ganancias obtenidas por medio de esta rubro a la ampliación de sus cultivos de café en un pedazo de tierra que aún no está plantado sembrando una mejor variedad como el caturra un producto más delicado pero es muy bien pagado en el mercado.
texts.en: Carminda, 38 years old, is very hard-working. She is in a civil union, and her partner is both a builder and a farmer. She completed primary school. The couple lives alone in their house, as they have no children. Carminda has a shop but works on the family farm during the week, helping her partner tend to the coffee crops. On weekends, she sells fruits and vegetables in her area's town market. The couple bought the plot of land thanks to money inherited from their respective parents. They grow a great variety of crops, and the land is located some 3 kilometres from their house. They go there by foot, since there is no other transport available. Carminda hopes for an excellent harvest this year, since the household's finances depend on it. They sell the coffee to middlemen who come to their village. Her main goal in asking for this loan is to buy fertiliser, various types of manure, and fungicides, in order to avoid the spread of disease ruining the crops. Her plans for the future are to invest part of the profits from the sale of the harvest in order to increase the area covered by her coffee crops, since they still have a free plot of land available. She intends to plant a better variety of coffee, named 'caturra', which is more fragile but sells much better on the market.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to grow coffee crops.

loans.name: Gulaim

texts.ru: Гулаим 60 лет, вдова, одна воспитала 3 детей. Две дочери находятся на заработках в России и помогают материально. Сын с супругой и маленьким ребенком живут вместе с Гулаим. У Гулаим - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулаим занимается животноводством, стартовав 32 года назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулаим, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 теленка, 2 лошади, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулаим обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку теленка для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулаим планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на проведение праздника для новорожденного внука.
texts.en:
Gulaim is 60 years old, a widow, and raised three children on her own. Two daughters are living abroad in Russia and help materially. Her son and his wife and small children live with Gulaim. Gulaim has a high school education. As a main source of income for her family, Gulaim is engaged in raising livestock, having started 32 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 1,000 som KGS.

Thanks to her hard work, Gulaim currently has on her homestead: two dairy cows, two calves, two horses, and 10 sheep. Monthly income consists of 12,000 som (KGS). With the aim of further developing her homestead, Gulaim turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy a calf for increasing her headcount of livestock.

Gulaim plans to invest income from the loan to further propagate the quantity of domestic livestock, and plans to save money to put on a celebration of her newborn grandson.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia is a 37-year old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She has five children; she barely manages to satisfy their needs. She is required to provide them with good food, health, and education. 

Her husband has been manufacturing spare parts for sewing machines for many years. He buys scrap steel material from the market and melts it under a high temperature. The raw material is then injected into dies to give it a specific shape. In this way he manufactures the spare parts, sells them in the market, and makes enough income to contribute to his family's livelihood.

She needs to earn additional income to support her family well. She is in her sixth loan cycle with BRAC Pakistan, and it will be her first loan with Kiva.

She has requested a loan to buy more raw materials for manufacturing sewing machine parts so that her husband can increase his sales. 

She expects a boost in his earnings, and wishes to spend part of the profits on the expansion of his business.

Asia is very thankful to the Kiva and the field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy raw material for manufacturing spare parts for sewing machines.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia, age 38, deals in the business of animal sales. She buys baby goats, heifers, bull calfs, etc. at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries).  The bull calfs go to the butchers. 

She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income, but she needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. 

For this reason, she contacted BRAC Pakistan and applied for a loan to purchase more cattle. 

She is very experienced, and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income as well.

Razia thanks Kiva and the field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy cattle to sell.

loans.name: Rozina

texts.en:
Rozina is a 25-year-old married woman who is a mother of three children. For the past two years, she has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house. Rozina’s husband helps her buy purchasing stock at the market as he has maintained many good contacts over the years. She is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing, and health and her husband appreciates her efforts. Rozina is in her fourth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

Rozina is requesting a loan to buy packs of salt, biscuits, and beverages to meet her increasing customer demand. She expects a boost in her earnings and hopes to grow her business. Rozina dreams of expanding her business in the future and she thanks Kiva, Kiva lenders, and her field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy  of salt, biscuits, and beverages for her general store

loans.name: Suriya's Group

texts.en:
Suriya is a 42-year-old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of six children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. 

For a long time, he has wanted to replace his old rickshaw's body. Because of this, he is unable to attract passengers due to the ugly looking vehicle and to generate any amount of income. He wants to buy it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of the new rickshaw body. 

Therefore, Suriya has requested for a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of the rickshaw body. This will help him to continue his business. She is so very thankful to Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw body.

loans.name: Mutsinda Group

texts.fr:
Déo  fait partie du groupe  Mutsinda  et  habite à Bubanza. Il  a 30 ans et est marié à Fidès. Ensemble ils ont  3 enfants âgés  de  1 à  5 ans.

Il fait le commerce de riz ,de l'huile de palme et du sel depuis  4 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter 100kg de riz, 15litres d’huile de palme et 25 kg de sel, à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter  une parcelle.
texts.en:
Déo is part of the group Mutsinda and lives in Bubanza. He is 30 years old and married to Fidès. Together they have three children, from 1 to 5 years old. 

Déo has been selling rice, palm oil, and salt for four years.

This is his first Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase 100 kg of rice, 15 liters of palm oil, and 25 kg of salt to resell, so as to earn more. 

In the coming years, he would like to purchase a parcel of land.

loans.use: to purchase rice, palm oil, and salt to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Bernarda

texts.es: Bernarda de 46 años de edad  habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo y su grupo familiar. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se caracteriza por ser honesta y responsable. Bernarda se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, además, también tiene una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia; estos negocios son fundamentales en la economía de su hogar ya que su esposo es un pequeño agricultor y los cultivos salen una vez al año lo que implica que las ventas se dan solo en una temporada. Gracias al esfuerzo de los dos, su familia va saliendo adelante y luchando por mejores condiciones de vida. Desea construir un corredor en su casa para evitar que el agua azote cuando llueve y dañe sus pocas pertenencias. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada,  madera, arena y cemento.
texts.en:
Bernarda, 46, lives in her own home with her husband and family.  She is a very hardworking woman who is known for her honesty and responsibility.  Bernarda has a business making and selling tortillas.  She also has a small store in her home.  These businesses are essential to the finances of her household, because her husband is a small farmer and his harvest comes only once a year, which means that his sales are made only in one season.  Thanks to both of their efforts, the family is getting ahead and striving to improve their living conditions.  

Bernarda wants to build a porch on her house so that water doesn't enter the home when it rains and damage their minimal belongings. This is why she is requesting this loan from FUSIA to invest in the purchase of sheets of metal roofing material, wood, sand and cement.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a porch

loans.name: Dúo Presencia Group

texts.es: Dúo Presencia este grupo esta conformado por la señora Maria Antonieta de 49 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para bebe y a la venta de cosmeticos se ha dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, ya que por medio de su negocio ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su famililam, es espa oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para comprar ropa tipica y comprar cosmeticos esperando que nuevamente le pueda ayudar ya que en el primer creditos no cayo en mora y estubo puntual en sus pagos.
texts.en: The communal bank "Duo Presencia" includes Maria Antonieta, 49, who has a business selling baby clothes and cosmetics.  She's had this business for a number of years, and through this business she has been able to help her family to get ahead.  At this time, she is requesting a loan to buy traditional clothing and cosmetics.  She hopes once again that this will help her, because with her first loans she did not fall behind - she made her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Livingstone

texts.en:
Livingstone lives in the highland area of Kericho. He is married and has 4 children. He is an established farmer who has been doing this work for 30 years. Like the residents of Kericho, Livingstone's main source of income is milk, tea and some crops. He enjoys doing dairy farming because it has good returns, but the challenge he faces is that the price of milk is not constant.

Livingstone chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they help small-scale farmers to purchase assets for their farms. He learned how to develop a culture of saving during the training period. This loan will help Livingstone purchase poultry and this poultry will bring in more income to his family.

loans.use: To purchase poultry

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.en:
Gilbert is a 41-year-old married man. He and his wife are blessed with three children.

To earn a living, he works as a farmer. Specifically, he cultivates rice. He explains that his net income from each harvest typically goes toward his family's daily needs and other household expenses. But because of the recent high costs of farming inputs, income generated from his farming business is no longer enough to provide for the family.

As a result, he decided to seek additional capital through Kiva. Specifically, he is requesting a loan in the amount of 30,000 PHP to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides. He is confident that the loan proceeds will enable him to purchase the necessities for his farm, which will in turn enable him earn a higher yield for the benefit of his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for his farming operations

loans.name: Amada Victoria

texts.es:
Amada, es una señora de 43 años, es soltera, tiene dos hijos, vive junto a su madre ya muy anciana y sus hijos los cuales están estudiando. Aprendió de su mamá a vender comida, tostadas y desde hace 15 años lo hace de forma independiente, sus actividades económicas son la venta de comida, tostadas y productos de belleza. Para ella no ha sido difícil manejar estas actividades.
Comprará plátanos, frijoles, aceite, arroz, lociones, cremas corporales rubores, etc., esta inversión le ayudara aumentar su inventario, aumentar sus ventas, satisfacer sus clientes, tener mejores ingresos con los que mejorara el estilo de vida de su familia y pagara su deuda.
Sueña con ampliar más el negocio y darles una oportunidad de educación superior a sus hijos
texts.en:
Amada is a single 43 year-old woman who has 2 children.  She lives with her mother, who is very elderly, and her children, who attend school.  Amada learned to sell food and tostadas from her mother.  She began working independently 15 years ago.  She has a business selling food, tostadas, and beauty products.  For her, it has not been difficult to manage these activities.

With this loan, Amada will buy bananas, beans, cooking oil, lotions, body creams, blush, etc.  This investment will help her to increase her inventory, increase her sales, satisfy her customers, and have more income to improve her family's living standard and pay off her debt.

Amada dreams of growing her business and providing her children with a higher education.

loans.use: to buy bananas, beans, cooking oil, rice, lotions, body creams, and blush

loans.name: German Arnoldo Antonio

texts.es:
German, tiene 24 años, es casado, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 3 años de edad, viven junto a su esposa y sus hijos, se dedica a sembrar granos básicos y a la ganadería es un oficio que aprendió de su papá, ya tiene 10 años ejerciéndolo. 
Invertirá en la compra de abono, fertilizantes, plaguicidas y herbicidas que necesita para preparar adecuadamente la tierra y tener mejores ingresos, mayores ventas, una cosecha abundante y un negocio más amplio.
Aspira q tener una mejor economía para que sus hijos crezcan en un ambiente sano y que puedan tener la oportunidad de superación.
texts.en:
German is 24 years old, married, and has two children, ages 5 and 3. He lives with his wife and children and works growing basic grains and raising cattle. He learned his work from his father, and he has been doing this work now for 10 years.

German is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides that he needs to prepare the earth. He hopes to earn a better income, increase his sales, have an abundant harvest and increase the size of his business. He would like to improve his family’s economic situation so that his children will grow up in a healthy environment and will have the opportunity to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Eris Rodolfo

texts.es:
Eris, está reparando su inventario para estas épocas de fin de año en las que las ventas aumentan y sus clientes buscan más variedad de productos, comprara cuadernos, lapiceros, borradores, sacapuntas, maíz, frijoles, azúcar, bebidas, golosinas.
Con el crédito anterior sus productos satisficieron las necesidades de sus clientes, aumentaron sus ventas, sus ganancias mejoraron y con ellas cancelo las cuotas del crédito, contribuyo más a los gastos de su casa.
texts.en:
Eris is adjusting his inventory for the end of the year season when sales increase and his customers look for a greater variety of products. He will buy notebooks, pencils, erasers, pencil sharpeners, corn, beans, sugar, drinks and candy.

With his previous loan, the products he purchased satisfied the needs of his customers, increased sales, and his earnings improved. With this enhanced income, Eris made his loan payments on time and made additional contributions to household expenses.

loans.use: buy notebooks, pencils, erasors, sharpeners, corn, beans, sugar, drinks, and candy to sell.

loans.name: Mubemaso Group

texts.fr:
Elisha fait partie du groupe  Mubemaso  et  habite à Cibitoke. Il  a 37 ans et est marié à Générose. Ensemble ils ont  7 enfants âgés  de  3 à  12 ans,dont 4 étudient.

Il fait le commerce de bananes depuis 14 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et louer  un champ de bananes, pour avoir beaucoup de bananes à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter  un champ de bananes  et voir ses enfants  étudier.
texts.en:
Elisha lives in Cibitoke and is a member of Mubemaso Group. He's 37 years old and married to Générose. Together, they have seven children, aged 3 to 12. Out of them, four attend school.

Elisha has been selling bananas for 14 years. This is his first loan with Kiva's partner, Turame. He will use this Kiva loan to bolster his working capital and rent a banana field, in order to have a lot of bananas to sell and increase his income.

In the forthcoming years, he would like to buy a banana field and see his children study.

loans.use: to rent a banana field

loans.name: Divine Group

texts.fr: La cliente Tamasha est une conseillère  de l’association  d’affaire  «Divine», senior  entrepreneur expérimentée, dynamique, âgée de 45 ans  et mère de 9 enfants qui étudient tous.  Son conjoint est un chômeur, toute fois, il réalise occasionnellement des petites commissions sur la vente de parcelle. La cliente est  une vendeuse de braises.  Elle installe ses marchandises au marché public  et parfois à son domicile.  Elle commença ses affaires avec l’assistance de projet Hekima (le  prêt de l’IMF Hekima).  Il y a 5 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité.  Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 12 sacs de braises.  Ainsi, elle souhaite  étendre son projet de commerce et construire une maison pour ses enfants.  Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, surtout ; pendant ce moment critique de guerre à l’Est du pays. Il sied de signaler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en:
This client, Tamasha, is an advisor of the business association "Divine". She is a senior entrepreneur, experienced, energetic, 45 years old, and the  mother of nine children, who are all students. Her husband is unemployed, yet he occasionally earns a small commission selling parcels of land. Tamasha is a vendor of charcoal. She sets ups her merchandise at the public market and sometimes at home. She started her business with Hekima plan assistance (a loan from the microfinance institution Hekima). She has been in this business for five years. 

This new loan will be used to purchase 12 sacks of charcoal. Thus, she would like to expand her business plans and build a house for her children. 

In conclusion, she thanks Hekima very much for promoting autonomy among unbanked women entrepreneurs, especially during this critical time of war in the country's east. It should be noted that one client is holding her baby.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to resell

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Victoria Del Carmen

texts.es: Victoria es originaria de la ciudad de Granada, madre de cinco hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comida y ropa, el cual le ha generado un bienestar en su negocio. Se siente agradecida con kiva y Micrédito ya que ha conseguido obtener mejores ganancias debido a que sabido cumplir con la demanda del cliente, y sus ventas han resultado muy buenas. Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar: ropa al por mayor, platos, arroz, entre otros, con el fin de crecer en los dos negocios. Estima que este crédito será beneficioso ya que podrá pagar los impuestos de la aduana ya que las pacas enviadas por sus familiares del exterior lo cual le resultara más barato, y obtendrá mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Victoria comes from the town of Granada and has five children. She sells clothes and food and is happy with her business. She is grateful to Kiva and the field partner since she managed to increase her income thanks to the previous loan, which she used to meet customer demand. She had very good sales. She asks for a new loan to buy clothes wholesale, plates, and rice, among other things. Her aim is to see both sides of her business grow. She thinks this loan will be very useful to pay for custom duties for the parcels of merchandise her family sends her from abroad, where it is cheaper to buy it. She hopes for better profits.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Tursabubu

texts.ru: Турсабубу 60 лет, замужем, мать-героиня, вместе с супругом воспитывают 8 детей. Семья очень большая, трудолюбивая и дружная. Пятеро из детей женаты, проживают отдельно со своими семьями, посещают своих родителей на выходные дни и праздники. Остальные живут и  помогают Турсабубу по хозяйству. У Турсабубу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Турсабубу занимается животноводством, стартовав 21 год назад, с покупки скота на 42,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Турсабубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 нетель, 2 теленка, 5 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 4,300 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Турсабубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Турсабубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en:
Tursabubu is 60 years old, married, a mother-heroine who together with her husband is bringing up eight children. The family is very large, hardworking and friendly. Five of the children are married, living separately with their own families, and visiting their parents on weekends and holidays. The remaining children live with and help Tursabubu around the homestead.

Tursabubu has a high school education. As a main source of income for her family, Tursabubu is engaged in raising livestock, having started 21 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 42,000 com KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Tursabubu currently has on her homestead: one dairy cow, one heifer, two calves, and five sheep. Monthly income consists of 4,300 com (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Tursabubu turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep for increasing the head count of livestock.

Tursabubu plans to invest income from the loan to further propagate the quantity of livestock, and plans to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Florinda

texts.en:
Florinda is applying for a loan of 1,000 USD from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is 30 years old. Florinda is running a kiosk in front of her house and she will use the loan to buy stock such as beer, Fanta, Coca Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, noodles, oil, milk, and water to keep in her store. She is making good money from selling and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. 

Florinda is living in a town near the school. Her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to buy, including students.

loans.use: To buy beer, Fanta, Coca Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, salt, noodles, oil, milk, and water

loans.name: Nasrin

texts.en:
Nasrin is a 49-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is very hardworking and loves his family very much. He is involved in his own business, which allows him to provide a regular income for the family. He is involved in the business of manufacturing and selling furniture such as single beds and tables. He started this business as a young man. Now, he is older and weaker than when he started the business.

Her husband has many regular customers and also takes orders from other cities. The business yields a good income for her husband. But her family's needs are increasing day by day and she needs more money to afford household expenses.

For these reasons, she went to BRAC Pakistan and hopes to obtain a loan. Specifically, she is seeking a loan to buy more raw materials for her husband so that he can make more furniture in order to expand the business. She hopes that this loan will prove beneficial and productive for his business and for their family as well. Nasrin thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for their support.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials for her husband's furniture-making business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria lives in town with her family. To earn a living, she opened her own kiosk in 2010. Maria explains that she generates good income from selling products at her kiosk.

She is now seeking a loan in the amount of $1,000 to improve her business. She plans on using the loan proceeds to buy stocks to keep in her store, including fanta, sprite, sagiko, noodles, cigarettes, water, sugar, and coffee. In the future, she would like to run a big business.

loans.use: To expand and improve her business by purchasing additional inventory (e.g., fanta, sprite, sagiko, noodles, cigarettes, water, sugar, and coffee)

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is 42 years old and married. Her husband provides sheltering services to earn money to feed the entire family. He has been doing this for many years and uses wooden planks and bamboos, which depreciate over time.

Bushra 's  husband is unable to continue his business without wooden boards and bamboos. Therefore, she is requesting a loan for her husband, which he will use to new wooden smooth boards and bamboos to continue his business.  She hopes that this loan will bring positive changes in her life and her husband would earn maximum profit.

loans.use: to purchase sheltering materials for providing sheltering services.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en: Angelina runs a kiosk selling vegetables, which she has been doing for 13 years. She is requesting a loan for $1,000, which she will use to to buy stocks of carrots, tomatoes, capsicum, onions, garlic, and other vegetables. Angelina is earning a good income from her kiosk. In the future, she hopes to operate a big business.

loans.use: to purchase carrots, tomatoes, capsicum, onions, and garlic

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.ru: Шарофат живет на районе Шахристон. Ей 45 лет. Она замужем и имеет одного ребенка. Ее муж занимается животноводством и растениеводством, потому что климат Таджикистана вполне позволяет развивать такие деятельности. Шарофат тоже работает в сфере животноводства. В бизнесе купле и продаже крупнорогатых скотов она работает около 8 лет. На данный момент она берет кредит, чтобы развивать свой бизнес. На сегодняшний день у Шарофат имеется 3 крупнорогатого скота черного цвета, которых она содержит в коровнике. Одного из них вы можете увидеть на фотографии. Шарофат много сил выкладывает в свою работу и для нее ее деятельность очень важна. Она верит, что ей помогут. Шарофат ждет Вашей помощи!
texts.en:
Sharofat lives in the Shahriston region. She is 45 years old. She is married and has one young child. Her husband is engaged in raising livestock and crops, because the climate of Tajikistan is completely conducive to develop these kinds of activities. Sharofat also works in the sphere of animal husbandry. In this business buying and selling cattle, she has been working for about eight years.

Now, she is taking a loan to develop her business. Currently, Sharofat has three heads of cattle of a black color who she takes care of in a cowshed. One of them can be seen in the photograph. Sharofat puts a lot of effort into her work and for her it is very important activity. She believes that it can help her.

loans.use: to purchase cattle with the aim of increasing their headcount

loans.name: Zainap

texts.ru: Зайнап 44-летняя вдова. Она более 10 лет работает на заводе, где изготавливаются и ремонтируются ключи и замки. Ее мужа давно нет в живых. Зайнап живет с дочерью, зятем и внуком в городе Худжанд. У нее есть еще одна дочь, у которой двое детей. Все трое ее внуков ходят в дорогую частную школу имени Гёте, где преподают детям высококвалифицированные учителя. В этом году ее оба дочерей еще не оплатили за учебный год. Зайнап берет кредит, чтобы помочь дочерям и оплатить за учебу своих внуков. Она видит как ее внуки преуспевают в школе и хочет чтобы у них было светлое будущее.
texts.en:
Zainap is a 44-year-old widow. For more than ten years, she has worked in a factory, where they manufacture and repair keys and locks. Her husband for a long time has not been among the living. Zainap lives with her daughter, son-in-law and grandson on Khujand. She has another daughter, who has two children.

All three of her grandchildren go to an expensive private school call Goethe, where highly qualified teachers teach the children. This year, both of her daughters have not yet paid for the school year. Zainap is taking a loan to help her daughters and to pay for her grandchildren's studies. She sees how her grandchildren succeed in school and wants them to have a bright future.

loans.use: to pay for her three grandchildren's studies at a private school

loans.name: Saidniso

texts.en:
Saidniso is 34 years old. She is divorced and has two children. She has been very busy raising her son and daughter alone because her husband does not help with or provide for their children.

To earn a living, Saidniso works at the military registration and enlistment office. She has worked there more than five years. Saidniso explains that she works hard but that her salary is low. What's more, her son is ill and she does not have money to buy medicine for his treatment.

As a result, she is asking for a loan in the amount of 2,500 TJS to purchase medicine for her son. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase medicine to help treat her son's illness

loans.name: Mely

texts.en: Mely, 51 years of age, is married and blessed with three children. She has run a rice-farming business for almost 20 years and earns a net income of 40,000 PHP per harvest season. She used some of her profits to earn additional income by starting a hog-raising business and pay her electric bill. She is requesting a loan for 25,000 PHP to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and seedlings. She's hoping that her income will increase in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and seedlings.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es:
Ana, se decidió por un nuevo crédito para fortalecer el negocio de venta de comida, con la inversión comprara maíz, frijoles, arroz, carnes, aceite y verduras, son los ingredientes necesarios para seguir elaborando sus diferentes menús, tener a clientes más satisfechos.
Con el crédito anterior mejoro su atención, amplió su negocio y su economía ha mejorado. Su familia sigue apoyándola en el negocio y se encuentran saludables.
texts.en: Ana decided to request another loan to strengthen her food sales business. She will use the loan to buy corn, beans, rice, meat, oil and vegetables. These are the ingredients she needs to continue making her various menus and keep her customers happy. She says that with her previous loan she was able to improve the service she offers, expand her business and improve her economic situation. Her family continues to support her with her business, and she reports that they are all healthy.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, rice, meat, oil and vegetables.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en: Arlene is 42 years old, married and the mother of one child. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur who runs a business selling dried fish in the Philippines. Arlene has requested a PHP 7,000 loan from NWTF to buy more fish to sell to customers. She has been in this business for two years and would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.en:
Natalia is applying for a loan in the amount of $1.200 to improve her business. She runs a business out of her house, where she sells women's and men's shoes, clothes, and hair ties. She opened her business a year ago with $600 of working capital.

She explains that she earns good income from the business, but that she wants to expand. So, she plans on using the loan proceeds to buy more stocks. She conveniently lives in town near the main road, so many people come to buy her goods on a daily basis.

loans.use: To expand and improve her business by purchasing additional inventory (e.g,. women's and men's shoes, clothes, and hair ties).

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha, es una joven de 28 años de edad, tiene una hijita de 5 añitos, estudia el primer grado, Martha anteriormente laboraba para una zona franca pero sus deseos de independizarse y superarse la lleva a renunciar y con su liquidación empieza a dedicarse al comercio, en donde hoy en día vende perfumes, calzado y ropa en una esquinita de su casa de habitación, actualmente tiene poco en inventario y con este crédito solicitado desea aumentar el volumen de productos comprando ropa variada, zapatos, cosméticos, de esta manera ella quiere  mejorar sus condiciones económicas para cubrir las  necesidades de su hija y garantizarle un buen futuro.
texts.en: Martha is a young woman of 28. She has a little daughter who is 5 years old and attends first grade. Martha previously worked in a free port zone, but her desire to work independently and get ahead in life led her to leave this job. With the severance pay, she began to dedicate herself to trade. Today, she sells perfumes, shoes and clothing from a corner of the house where she lives. She currently has little inventory, and with the loan she is requesting, she wants to increase the volume of products, buying a variety of clothing, shoes and cosmetics. In this way, she wants to improve her economic condition so that she can cover her daughter's necessities and guarantee her a good future.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing, shoes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru:
Замира жительница города Конибодом. Она замужем и является матерью двоих сыновей, которым по 19 и 15 лет, и дочери, которой 10 лет. В данный момент ее старший сын и муж работают за пределами страны. Младший сын и дочь учатся в средней школе. Замира по профессии швея. Она уже 20 лет шьёт национальные женские платья. Замира научилась этому ремеслу у своей матери еще в юном возрасте. Это помогло ей в жизни зарабатывать деньги и обеспечивать семью.
Сейчас Замира хочет расширить свое швейное дело. С этой целью она просит кредит. Замира собирается приобрести модернизированную компьютерную вышивальную машинку, с помощью которой она будет шить быстрее и качественнее, а также она сможет делать на платьях вышивки.
texts.en:
Zamira is a resident of the town of Konibodom. She is married and is the mother of two sons who are 19 and 15 years old, and a daughter who is ten. Currently, her elder son and husband are working outside the country. Her younger son and daughter are in school. By profession, Zamira is a seamstress. She has been sewing for 20 years already national women's dresses. Zamira learned thi craft from her mother at an early age. This has helped her in life to earn a living and to support her family.

Now, Zamira wants to expand her sewing activities. With this aim, she requested a loan. Zamira intends to purchase a modernized digital embroidery machine, with the help of which she will sew quickly and with high quality, and in this way she will be able to make embroidery on dresses.
